data.backstory: Hailing from the Spine of the World, Bruenor is the leader of Clan Battlehammer. He is close friends with the celebrated drow Drizzt Do'Urden and the halfling Regis. Rounding out the 'Companions of the Hall' are his two adopted human children: Catti-Brie and Wulfgar.

abilities.name: Inspired

raw.tip_text: Bruenor does more damage if he's adjacent to more Champions. Place him next to as many Champions as you can.
raw.name: Inspired

description.desc: Increase the damage of $target by $amount% for each adjacent Champion

abilities.desc: Bruenor does more damage if he's adjacent to more Champions. Place him next to as many Champions as you can.

abilities.name: Rally

raw.tip_text: Bruenor increases the damage of Champions in the same column as him. Place him in the same column as your most damaging Champions.
raw.name: Rally

description.desc: Increases the damage of Champions in the same column as $source by $(amount)%

abilities.desc: Bruenor increases the damage of Champions in the same column as him. Place him in the same column as your most damaging Champions.

abilities.name: Dwarven Glory

description.desc: Increases the effect of $(upgrade_name id) by $amount% for each Dwarf (other than $source_hero) in the formation

abilities.desc: Increases the effect of Rally by 100% for each Dwarf (other than Bruenor) in the formation.

abilities.name: King of the Hall

description.desc: Your formation gains one Mithral Hall stack. Bruenor increases the effect of Rally by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Mithral Hall stack you have, stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.desc: Your formation gains one Mithral Hall stack. Bruenor increases the effect of Rally by 100% for each Mithral Hall stack you have, stacking multiplicatively.

ult.description: Bruenor delivers a devastating blow to the closest enemy.
ult.long_description: Bruenor delivers a devastating blow to a single enemy using his shield and axe.
ult.name: Bash

base.description: Bruenor slashes at the closest enemy with his axe.
base.name: Slice

effects: Increases the damage of all Champions by 100%.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 20% for each Female Champion in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Dwarf Champions by 150%.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 40% for each Champion with a STR score of 15 or higher in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Champions with a CHA score of 11 or higher by 100%.
Increases the damage of all Neutral Champions by 150%.

data.name: Bruenor

items.name: Chipped Axe
items.description: It isn't much, but it'll get the job done.

items.name: Sharpened Axe
items.description: So sharp I can skin dinner with it.

items.name: Well Used Axe
items.description: I've lost count of the number of goblins slaughtered by its razor edge.

items.name: Many-notched Axe
items.description: This axe has seen a thousand battles, and been victorious in every one.

items.name: Iron Beard Clips
items.description: They're a bit heavy, but they keep my beard in check.

items.name: Steel Beard Clips
items.description: Lighter than your average clips, they let my beard swing furiously when I attack.

items.name: Dark Iron Beard Clips
items.description: Crafted from a meteorite that fell near Icewind Dale.

items.name: Gold Beard Clips of the Clan
items.description: Ancient family clips found in the depths of the Mithral Hall.

items.name: Frayed Belt
items.description: It'll hold up your pants, if you don't move around too quickly.

items.name: Faded Leather Belt
items.description: It's seen better days, but it still does the trick.

items.name: Thick Sturdy Belt
items.description: It's quite slimming!

items.name: Golden Hide Belt of the Ancestors
items.description: An ancient family belt recovered from a Battlehammer heirloom cache.

items.name: Plain Iron Ring
items.description: A simple ring with little magical power.

items.name: Shiny Steel Ring
items.description: A shiny ring that seems to radiate mild heat on its own.

items.name: Dark Iron Ring
items.description: A magical ring crafted from a fallen meteorite.

items.name: Golden Sigil Ring of Dwarves
items.description: Specially crafted by the craftsmen in Mirabar as a peace offering to Clan Battlehammer.

items.name: Dented Shield
items.description: Looks like someone took a warhammer to this.

items.name: Heavy Shield
items.description: If you can get it up in time, it'll do the job.

items.name: Strong Shield
items.description: It's strong enough to stop a blow from a raging giant.

items.name: Shield of Foaming Ale
items.description: A magical shield with secret and mysterious powers.

items.name: Broken Helm
items.description: To be fair, I think it's supposed to be broken.

items.name: Scuffed Helm
items.description: Someone needs to get some spit and polish on this thing.

items.name: Mithral Helm
items.description: Stronger than steel, and far lighter.

items.name: Gilded Helm of Clan Battlehammer
items.description: This helm has seen Bruenor through a hundred sticky situations.

data.backstory: It was only when Valindra Shadowmantle's undead horde was clawing at her door that the god Selûne came to Celeste. A wave of divine energy burst out from Celeste, annihilating the skeletons and zombies, leaving her unconscious. When she came to, she understood. She needed to assemble those who were dedicated to fighting evil and serve her god and her people.

abilities.name: Crusader's Mantle

raw.tip_text: Celeste increases the damage of adjacent Champions. Place her next to your most damaging Champions.
raw.name: Crusader's Mantle

description.desc: Increases the damage of Champions next to $source by $(amount)%

abilities.desc: Celeste increases the damage of adjacent Champions. Place her next to your most damaging Champions.

ult.description: Celeste calls forth a pillar of flame centered on a random enemy.
ult.long_description: Celeste prays for the power of Selûne to call forth a pillar of flame on a random enemy, burning all nearby enemies as well. Simultaneously, a pillar of light heals living party members to full health.
ult.name: Flame Strike

base.description: A flash of light streaks towards the closest enemy.
base.name: Guiding Bolt

effects: Increases the damage of all Champions by 100%.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 20% for each Female Champion in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Human Champions by 150%.
Increases the damage of all Champions with a STR score of 11 or higher by 100%.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 20% for each Champion with a CON score of 11 or higher in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 30% for each Magic Champion in the formation.

data.name: Celeste

items.name: Iron Headband
items.description: An understated headband with a small blue gem.

items.name: Silver Headband
items.description: A scuffed headband with brilliant potential.

items.name: Gold Headband
items.description: A complex headband composed of dozens of golden leaves.

items.name: Ornate Headband of Faith
items.description: A golden headband inlaid with a brilliant blue sapphire.

items.name: Cloth Gauntlets
items.description: They'll keep the dust off my hands, at least.

items.name: Leather Gauntlets
items.description: The inside is padded to protect against bumps and bruises.

items.name: Golden Gauntlets
items.description: Masterfully crafted to fit my hands precisely.

items.name: Scale Gauntlets of Selûne
items.description: The small inlaid sapphires - tears of Selûne herself - empower myself and my allies.

items.name: Cloth Belt
items.description: A basic belt from a simpler time in my life.

items.name: Soft Belt
items.description: Given to me by a sister cleric on my first day of worship at the temple.

items.name: Thick Scalemail Belt
items.description: This belt has saved my life in battle many times.

items.name: Obsidian Scale Belt of the Moon
items.description: The texture of this belt matches exactly the face of the goddess above.

items.name: Iron Amulet
items.description: Commonly carried by many of Selûne's acolytes.

items.name: Steel Amulet
items.description: A more durable form of a commonly carried amulet.

items.name: Copper Amulet
items.description: Often mistaken for gold, this amulet shines nearly as bright.

items.name: Golden Amulet of the Goddess
items.description: One of the few relics recovered from Shadowmantle's undead horde.

items.name: Cloth Boots
items.description: Comfortable, but not ideal for long journeys such as this one.

items.name: Smooth Leather Boots
items.description: Durable and soft, these boots can last a lifetime if properly cared for.

items.name: Chainmail Boots
items.description: Not the stealthiest boot, but then stealth was never my style.

items.name: Well Fitted Boots of Fellowship
items.description: One of Selûne's skilled followers crafted these for me after I saved them.

items.name: Faded Holy Symbol
items.description: Though old, this item still holds a dear place in my heart.

items.name: Understated Holy Symbol
items.description: Never underestimate the wrath of an angry goddess.

items.name: Ornate Holy Symbol
items.description: A fine tribute to the true goddess of the night sky.

items.name: Holy Symbol of Selûne's Grace
items.description: Bestowed upon me by the goddess herself in my greatest time of need.

data.backstory: A once trusted guardian and advisor of Duke Maldwyn of Daggerford, Nayeli Goldflower is now a paladin without a lord who wanders Toril on the hunt for devils and those who would summon and commune with the infernal. She worships Tyr, the god of justice, who has blessed her sword to seek out and destroy any infernal presence.

abilities.name: Aura of Courage

raw.tip_text: Nayeli increases the damage of Champions in the column behind hers. Place her in front of your most damaging Champions.
raw.name: Aura of Courage

description.desc: Increases the damage of Champions in the column behind $source by $(amount)%

abilities.desc: Nayeli increases the damage of Champions in the column behind hers. Place her in front of your most damaging Champions.

abilities.name: Aura of Protection

raw.tip_text: Nayeli increases your formation's damage for each enemy attacking her. Place her at the front of your formation to take advantage of this.
raw.name: Aura of Protection

description.desc: Increases the damage of all Champions by $(amount)% for each enemy attacking $source and/or each enemy enrage stack.

abilities.desc: Nayeli increases your formation's damage for each enemy attacking her. Place her at the front of your formation to take advantage of this.

abilities.name: Aura of Heroism

description.desc: Increases the Health of all other Champions by $amount% of $source's Max Health

abilities.desc: Increases the Health of all other Champions by 25% of Nayeli's Max Health.

specs.name: Oath of Devotion

raw.specialization_description: Nayeli focuses on tanking enemies and increasing her own survivability, keeping her foes from attacking her friends.

specs.desc: Nayeli focuses on tanking enemies and increasing her own survivability, keeping her foes from attacking her friends.

ult.description: Nayeli deals massive damage to a random enemy and stuns all enemies.
ult.long_description: Nayeli leaps to a random enemy, dealing massive damage and stunning all enemies.
ult.name: Banishing Smite

base.description: Nayeli cleaves all targets near the closest enemy.
base.name: Swing

effects: Increases the damage of all Champions by 100%.
Increases the damage of all Male Champions by 125%.
Increases the damage of all Human Champions by 150%.
Increases the damage of all Champions with a CON score of 15 or higher by 200%.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 30% for each Champion with a CHA score of 13 or higher in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Melee Champions by 150%.

data.name: Nayeli

items.name: Faded Figurine
items.description: A faded owl motif. Someday I'll tell you the story of it.

items.name: Hunting Figurine
items.description: A magical item used to hunt down those who have done wrong.

items.name: Detailed Owl Figurine
items.description: A brilliant serpentine owl figurine imbued with magical power.

items.name: Figurine Of Wondrous Power
items.description: A wondrous item that grants me the power to track down those I've sworn vengeance against.

items.name: Tarnished Breastplate
items.description: It's starting to rust, but it can still take a few good blows.

items.name: Iron Breastplate
items.description: A sturdy breastplate. Well enough to deliver evenhanded justice in, at least.

items.name: Ornate Breastplate
items.description: A fine breastplate, crafted using a special steel alloy known only to a few.

items.name: Breastplate of the Devoted Champion
items.description: It borders on gaudy, but you can't deny its raw power.

items.name: Heavy Chainmail Shirt
items.description: It restricts my movement, but not enough to hinder the Maimed God's justice.

items.name: Fine Chainmail Shirt
items.description: As fine a shirt as you could expect to find, from a common merchant.

items.name: Dwarven Mithral Shirt
items.description: Even dwarven folk can appreciate the need for Tyr's justice.

items.name: Finely Crafted Scalemail of Justice
items.description: Gifted to me by Lord Maldwyn, shortly before... I'd rather not talk about it.

items.name: Basic Gauntlets
items.description: Your run of the mill plate gauntlets.

items.name: Sturdy Gauntlets
items.description: They won't budge in battle, and with a sturdy wrist will deflect all but the strongest attack.

items.name: Paladin's Gauntlets
items.description: A finely crafted gauntlet worn by many Paladins throughout the land.

items.name: Gauntlets of Sworn Vengeance
items.description: Pristine scalemail gauntlets that give my blows a little extra oomph.

items.name: Simple Holy Symbol
items.description: The symbol of Tyr strikes fear into evil-doers everywhere.

items.name: Polished Holy Symbol
items.description: This symbol has been meticulously cared for over the years. A great sign of respect.

items.name: Devoted Holy Symbol
items.description: The Lord of Justice himself blessed this necklace.

items.name: Extravagant Symbol of Tyr
items.description: I've devoted my life to justice for all in Tyr's name.

items.name: Dull Iron Greatsword
items.description: A trainee's sword, but in the right hands, it can still do damage.

items.name: Sharp Steel Greatsword
items.description: Crafted by the finest smithy in Daggerford.

items.name: Strong Magical Greatsword
items.description: This sword vanquishes all foes, whether or not they come from this plane.

items.name: Blessed Sword of Tyr
items.description: The Lord of Justice blessed this sword and my mission on his behalf.

data.backstory: Jarlaxle is a flamboyant, swashbuckling drow who leads Bregan D'aerthe, a band of drow outcasts and renegades from Menzoberranzan. Jarlaxle secretly controls the northern city of Luskan from the shadows by manipulating the five High Captains who rule the city.

abilities.name: Master of Piracy

raw.tip_text: Jarlaxle increases your gold find based on the number of Drow or Rogue Champions in your formation.
raw.name: Master of Piracy

description.desc: Increases gold find by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Drow or Rogue Champion in the formation

abilities.desc: Jarlaxle increases your gold find based on the number of Drow or Rogue Champions in your formation.

abilities.name: Master of Disguise

raw.tip_text: Jarlaxle increases his own damage when he is adjacent to Good or Neutral Champions.
raw.name: Master of Disguise

description.desc: Increases the damage of $source by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Good or Neutral champion next to them

abilities.desc: Jarlaxle increases his own damage when he is adjacent to Good or Neutral Champions.

abilities.name: Master Attuner

description.desc: Increases the damage of $source by $amount% for each $(describe_rarity rarity) item equipped by other Champions in the formation

abilities.desc: Increases the damage of Jarlaxle by 25% for each 4 item equipped by other Champions in the formation.

ult.description: Jarlaxle summons the Bregan D'aerthe to attack enemies in the formation from afar with cannon fire.
ult.long_description: Jarlaxle summons the Bregan D'aerthe to attack enemies in the formation from afar with cannon fire.
ult.name: Raiding Party

base.description: Jarlaxle attacks the furthest enemy. If it dies, he keeps on attacking, halving his damage each time.
base.name: Rapier

effects: Increases the damage of all Champions by 100%.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 20% for each Male Champion in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Elf Champions by 150%.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 30% for each Champion with a INT score of 13 or higher in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 20% for each Champion with a CON score of 11 or higher in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 40% for each Champion in the formation with a EVIL alignment.

data.name: Jarlaxle

items.name: Common Rapier
items.description: Good enough for the common folk, but I'll soon be upgrading, I assure you.

items.name: Well Balanced Rapier
items.description: You can't be very effective with an unbalanced sword, you know!

items.name: Majestic Rapier
items.description: There's nothing quite so elegant or majestic as a finely crafted rapier.

items.name: Swashbuckling Rapier of Last Resort
items.description: When you need to put on a show, a rapier will often do the trick.

items.name: Effective Eye Patch
items.description: It does the job, but not much more.

items.name: Stylish Eye Patch
items.description: Now that's a swashbuckling look!

items.name: Enhanced Eye Patch
items.description: I've got a few more tricks up my sleeve. Or over my eye, rather.

items.name: Knave's Eye Patch
items.description: You can't hide from my magical eye... patch.

items.name: Faux Feathered Hat
items.description: It's not a real feather at all! Why would someone do this?

items.name: Gull Feathered Hat
items.description: A decent enough feather, I suppose. In a pinch.

items.name: Velvet Feathered Hat
items.description: It's a pleasure to wear, though not for my enemies.

items.name: Magical Diatryma Feathered Hat
items.description: You don't want to mess with this feather.

items.name: Faded Cloak
items.description: A quick dip in an enchanted underdark pool aught to brighten this right up.

items.name: Brightly Colored Cloak
items.description: A useful distraction if you want your foes to see your cloak and not yourself.

items.name: Lesser Piwafwi Cloak
items.description: It has some use, but it could be so much more.

items.name: Many-hued Piwafwi Cloak
items.description: With this cloak, I am all but invisible.

items.name: Dented Iron Ring
items.description: It once had magical powers, but now it's just an old piece of metal.

items.name: Scuffed Steel Ring
items.description: Rub it three times and a genie pops out. Aha! Gotcha! So gullible.

items.name: Ring of Power
items.description: But what power, you ask? I'll never tell.

items.name: Ornate Ring of Foresight
items.description: If I know where my enemies will be, they're that much easier to hit.

items.name: Simple Spurs
items.description: A simple accessory, but quite useful in the right situation.

items.name: Dull Steel Spurs
items.description: Remind me sometime to tell you the story of how I came into possession of these.

items.name: Shiny Mithral Spurs
items.description: Dirty dwarven metal, sure, but you can't deny the craftsmanship.

items.name: Masterful Golden Spurs
items.description: A stylish addition to any outfit!

data.backstory: Calliope was raised on a pirate ship, and yes, that's an excuse for her sometimes volatile behavior and colorful language. She'll sing you a song, but you better listen or she'll smash you with her lute. Calliope can't resist the lure of adventure or making new enemies, but it's her friends who serve as the family she never had.

ult.description: Calliope lets loose a piercing crossbow bolt and shields all members of the party.
ult.long_description: Calliope points her lute at a random enemy and lets loose a hidden crossbow bolt. It tears through all enemies in a line. After attacking, she engages her damage shield on all members of your party.
ult.name: Impale

base.description: Calliope lets loose a string of insulting melodies, hitting the two closest enemies.
base.name: Vicious Mockery

effects: Increases the damage of all Champions by 100%.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 20% for each Female Champion in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Half-Elf Champions by 150%.
Increases the damage of all Champions with a CHA score of 13 or higher by 150%.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 30% for each Champion with a CON score of 13 or higher in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 20% for each Champion in the formation with a CHAOTIC alignment.

data.name: Calliope

items.name: Simple Crossbow Bolt
items.description: It doesn't have to be fancy, but it will be messy.

items.name: Sharpened Crossbow Bolt
items.description: You don't want to be on the receiving end of this.

items.name: Broadhead Crossbow Bolt
items.description: It nearly doesn't fit in my lute!

items.name: Expertly Fletched Crossbow Bolt
items.description: You really have to jam it in there, but it hurts when it comes out.

items.name: Untuned Lute
items.description: It sounds terrible, so what'll you give me to stop playing?

items.name: Partially Tuned Lute
items.description: I've heard better, but it's a good focus for my songs and spells.

items.name: Whitewood Lute
items.description: Sturdy instruments are key to constant paydays.

items.name: Ornate Lute of Ballads
items.description: Hey, are you even listening to me? Argh! That's it...!

items.name: Rough Cloak
items.description: It's a little scratchy, but it keeps me warm.

items.name: Bard's Cloak
items.description: Your average bard's cloak. Good for blending into crowds... of bards.

items.name: Triple-Clasped Cloak
items.description: The only way this thing comes flying off in combat is if I'm feeling especially fabulous.

items.name: Stealthy Performer's Cloak
items.description: You wouldn't think a bright red cloak could be stealthy, but here we are.

items.name: Soft Leather Bracers
items.description: Comfortable, but not much help in combat.

items.name: Stiff Hide Bracers
items.description: You could deflect a dull sword with these, if you're quick enough, which I am.

items.name: Studded Leather Bracers
items.description: Some of the best wrist-based protection a girl can ask for.

items.name: Fingerless Bracers of the Foul Mouth
items.description: I know what you're thinking: aren't all bracers fingerless? Yeah, well... Shut up.

items.name: Patched Bag
items.description: You can't see it, but this thing is barely holding together.

items.name: Sturdy Leather Bag
items.description: It's holding knick-knacks from dozens of passed out pirates. They won't miss 'em.

items.name: Magically Enhanced Satchel
items.description: Touch the gem in the wrong way and boom! Hope you weren't too attached to that hand.

items.name: Leather Satchel of the Wanderer
items.description: I've seen plenty of the world, but I'm more than happy to see more of it.

items.name: Dusty Eyepatch
items.description: It's a little irritating, but it's stylish.

items.name: Soft Cloth Eyepatch
items.description: A pleasure to wear - it's like a blanket for my eye!

items.name: Sturdy Leather Eyepatch
items.description: A sturdy accessory that aids in my night time adventures.

items.name: Magical Eyepatch of the Bard
items.description: Oh, you want to know what my magical eyepatch does? Get in line, sailor.

data.backstory: The elder of Kir Sabal, Asharra is a stern and honorable aarakocra wizard who looks over her flock and the safety of the Omu royal family.

abilities.name: Paragon of Kir Sabal

description.pre: Increases the potency of each of Asharra's Bond abilties (separately) by $(not_buffed amount)% for every matching Bonded race in the party. Additionally, Asharra gains the effect of a given Bond if at least 4 Champions are affected by it

conditions.desc: $asharra_kir_sabal_desc

ult.description: Asharra pushes back all enemies and casts a massive Fireball on a random one.

items.name: Simple Jade Spear
items.description: The tip isn't as fragile as it looks.

items.name: Sharp Jade Spear

items.description: Imbued with magical power by the wizards of Kir Sabal.

items.name: Ornate Jade Spear of the Mind

items.name: Orb of Breezes

items.name: Orb of Gusts

items.name: Orb of Squalls

items.description: This robe has clearly seen better days.

items.name: Long Robe

items.name: Golden Robe

items.name: Swirling Robe of Gusting Wind

items.name: Simple Pouch

items.name: Dual Cloth Pouches
items.description: Twice the storage potential compared to single pouches!

items.name: Hardened Leather Pouch

items.name: Bottomless Pouch of Components
items.description: The components for nearly any spell you could imagine can be found in these pouches.

items.name: Common Aarakocra Necklace
items.description: A common necklace worn by the Aarakocra residents of Kir Sabal.

items.name: Scuffed Aarakocra Necklace
items.description: This necklace has seen combat, but is still holding together well. It must be lucky!

items.name: Jeweled Aarakocra Necklace

items.name: Masterfully Crafted Aarakocra Necklace
items.description: The craftsmanship on this necklace puts all others to shame.

items.name: Brass Armlet
items.description: A simple armlet, but good enough for the time being.

items.name: Polished Armlet
items.description: A well loved armlet that its previous owner obviously adored.

items.name: Jeweled Copper Armlet
items.description: A shiny armlet with what looks like a small citrine or amber set in it.

items.name: Magnificent Golden Armlet of Focus
items.description: A beautiful golden armlet set with a shining fire opal.

data.backstory: Minsc is a dim-witted but ferociously courageous ranger who saved Baldur's Gate and the surrounding area several times over the course of his adventures. He's accompanied by his stalwart companion Boo; a miniature giant space hamster.

abilities.name: Boastful

raw.tip_text: Minsc's boastful attitude causes extra enemies to sometimes spawn. Don't worry, Boo can handle them!
raw.name: Boastful

description.desc: Whenever a non-boss enemy wave spawns, there is a $(desc_chance_for_one)% chance of an extra enemy spawning, and a $(desc_chance_for_two)% chance of 2 extra enemies spawning. These enemies will always be Minsc's Favored Foe.

abilities.desc: Minsc's boastful attitude causes extra enemies to sometimes spawn. Don't worry, Boo can handle them!.

abilities.name: Overkill

ult.description: Minsc and Boo attack together, dealing massive cleaving damage.
ult.long_description: Minsc swings his greatsword in a massive circle centered on the front-most enemy while Boo leaps about causing up to 5 random enemies to take additional damage for the next 30 seconds.

items.name: Chipped Greatsword
items.description: Here's a tip for any adventurer: swords don't do so well against enemies made entirely of diamond.

items.name: Well Used Greatsword
items.description: Minsc has had this old blade nearly as long as he's been adventuring with Boo.

items.name: Sharp Greatsword
items.description: Minsc just got this sharpened by a smithy in Baldur's Gate. Good fellow. Cheap.

items.name: Grand Greatsword of Furious Blows
items.description: Evil, meet my sword! Sword, meet evil!

items.name: Basic Leather Vest
items.description: Less vest, more buttkicking!

items.name: Smooth Leather Vest
items.description: Smooth like a miniature giant space hamster's bottom! Smells like one, too!

items.name: Reinforced Leather Vest
items.description: It's got holes for Minsc's extremely large biceps, so Minsc is a fan!

items.name: Padded Leather Vest of Hamster Perches
items.description: Boo! Are you comfortable up there?

items.name: Cheap Iron Bracers
items.description: They may be cheap, but they do keep Minsc from lopping his own hands off.

items.name: Dull Iron Bracers
items.description: Hey, who are you calling dull?! Oh, the bracers. Yeah, they're pretty dull.

items.name: Full Iron Bracers
items.description: This reminds Minsc of a time... never mind.

items.name: Padded Iron Bracers of Comfort
items.description: Adventuring is quite exciting - at least until it's not. Then you need to be comfortable.

items.name: Faded Purple Cloak
items.description: It could use a little more color. Minsc knows a fellow in Waterdeep...

items.name: Smooth Purple Cloak
items.description: A decent enough cloak. If you're into normal things like that.

items.name: Purple Velvet Cloak
items.description: Oh! It's so soft! Don't even think about stealing it to nest in, Boo!

items.name: Silken Cloak of the Beloved Ranger
items.description: Minsc saves some king's daughter, and this is all he gets? Barely worth it!

items.name: Fraying Belt
items.description: Perhaps you will upgrade this belt the next time you are in town, yes?

items.name: Loose Belt
items.description: A good belt for long nights at the all-you-can-eat tavern!

items.name: Tight Leather Belt
items.description: It's important to keep your pants up, lest Boo bite you in hard to reach places.

items.name: Comfortable Belt of Destruction
items.description: Go for the belt, Boo! Go for the belt!

items.name: Simple Ranger Boots
items.description: You don't need fancy boots to kick some bad guy butt!

items.name: Smooth Studded Boots
items.description: They've got good traction if we ever head up north to Icewind Dale.

items.name: Solid Plate Boots
items.description: Solid buttkicking soles! Good find, Boo!

items.name: Buttkicking Boots of Wrath
items.description: Some of these enemies need a swift kick in the morals!

data.backstory: Delina is a young sorceress (by elven standards) with an inquisitive mind and fearless personality. Her pale skin and hair may give off the initial impression of vulnerability, but she carries great strength within.

abilities.name: Surge of Power

raw.tip_text: Delina's damage fluctuates over time, waxing and waning as she blasts enemies relentlessly with her magic.
raw.name: Surge of Power

description.desc: Increase the damage of $source by $(not_buffed amount)% each time they attack, up to a max of 10 stacks. Stacks reset 10 seconds after reaching max stacks or after not attacking for 10 seconds

abilities.desc: Delina's damage fluctuates over time, waxing and waning as she blasts enemies relentlessly with her magic.

abilities.name: Empowered Spell

description.desc: Whenever $source attacks, there is a $chance% chance that their spell will burn for an additional $amount% damage over 6 seconds

abilities.desc: Whenever Delina attacks, there is a 50% chance that their spell will burn for an additional 100% damage over 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Spell Bombardment

raw.tip_text: Delina deals additional damage if she's further back in the formation. Put her near the back to maximize the effect!
raw.name: Spell Bombardment

description.desc: Increase the damage of $source by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Champion in front of them in the formation, and by an additional $(not_buffed amount)% for each Heroes of Baldur's Gate Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.desc: Delina deals additional damage if she's further back in the formation. Put her near the back to maximize the effect!.

abilities.name: Twinned Spell

description.desc: Whenever $source attacks, there is a $chance% chance that they will copy their attack on another target

abilities.desc: Whenever Delina attacks, there is a 50% chance that they will copy their attack on another target.

ult.description: Delina's eyes begin to glow as she loses herself in her magic.
ult.long_description: Delina's eyes begin to glow as she loses herself in her magic, attacking faster and causing her Surge of Power ability to not reset for 15 seconds.
ult.name: Controlled Chaos

base.description: A small blast of fire hits a single random enemy
base.name: Wild Magic - Fire Bolt

effects: Increases the damage of all Champions by 10% for each Champion in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Female Champions by 125%.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 45% for each Elf Champion in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Champions with a WIS score of 11 or higher by 100%.

Increases the damage of all Champions by 30% for each Magic Champion in the formation.

data.name: Delina

items.name: Dull Iron Dagger
items.description: I prefer to stick to my magic, but in a pinch, I can use this.

items.name: Cutpurse's Dagger
items.description: I borrowed this from a cutpurse in Baldur's Gate who thought he could steal from me.

items.name: Sharp Steel Dagger
items.description: I don't like to resort to violence, but if I have to, this'll do.

items.name: Ruby Focused Dagger of Danger
items.description: In a pinch, I can channel my spells through the ruby on this dagger.

items.name: Pilfered Memento
items.description: Some trinket? It doesn't interest me, but it has some power within.

items.name: Follower's Necklace
items.description: This belonged to an acolyte of the Cult of the Dragon.

items.name: Master's Necklace
items.description: Someone of great power wore this necklace. But they're gone, and I'm still here.

items.name: Dragon Cult Leader's Necklace
items.description: My twin brother's necklace. It's a long story, and I'd rather not get into it.

items.name: Basic Orb
items.description: Very similar to the first focus given to me by my teacher.

items.name: Hovering Orb
items.description: Getting your focus to hover in your hand is the first task assigned to novice sorcerers.

items.name: Charged Orb
items.description: Channeling the Weave into your focus allows you to charge your spells.

items.name: Magical Orb of Elvenkind
items.description: This magical artifact has been passed down through generations of elves.

items.name: Loose Belt
items.description: More of a style piece than actually functional.

items.name: Simple Leather Belt
items.description: A simple enough belt. The sheath has a few holes in it.

items.name: Fine Belt and Sheath
items.description: A fine gift from a young human who once fancied me.

items.name: Golden Wayfarer's Belt of Adventure
items.description: I'm always up for an adventure! The more dangerous the better!

items.name: Ratty Cape
items.description: A simple sorcerer's cape with more than a few holes.

items.name: Smooth Cape
items.description: Someone has recently cleaned the cape. It wasn't me!

items.name: High Collared Cape
items.description: I look like quite the mature and knowledgeable elf wearing this. Little do they know.

items.name: Empowered Cape of Protection
items.description: My spells are empowered when I wear this cape. Not that they need to be.

items.name: Scratchy Robes
items.description: I can't believe anyone would wear these! Better than nothing, I guess.

items.name: Comfortable Robes
items.description: Hey, these are actually pretty comfy! Good find!

items.name: Masterful Silken Robe
items.description: I've been searching for the master who crafted this for years. It's wondrous!

items.name: Swirling Patterned Robe of Sorcery
items.description: It may look flimsy, but I can shrug off most attacks wearing this.

data.backstory: Makos grew up on the streets with a desire to rise above it all. He knows that his innate connection to infernal power is his key to achieving his goals, no matter the cost.

abilities.name: Draw Power

description.desc: Increase the effect of Dark Blessing by $amount% if $source is not on the edge of the formation

abilities.desc: Increase the effect of Dark Blessing by 100% if Makos is not on the edge of the formation.

abilities.desc: Increase the effect of Dark Luck by 100% for each Evil or Warlock Champion in the formation.

ult.description: A sphere of negative energy ripples out from a random enemy.
ult.long_description: A sphere of negative energy ripples out from a random enemy, causing that enemy and all other enemies near it to take heavy damage.
ult.name: Circle of Death

base.description: A beam of green crackling energy streaks towards a random enemy.

items.name: Necklace of Sparks
items.description: A few sparks are a beginning, but they're certainly not an end.

items.name: Necklace of Flickers
items.description: We're going to need to do better than this.

items.name: Necklace of Flame
items.description: Where there's smoke...

items.name: Golden Necklace of Fireballs
items.description: This ought to draw their attention.

items.name: Suspicious Dagger
items.description: There's something a little off about this dagger.

items.name: Evil Dagger
items.description: Yeah, this dagger is clearly evil. But it does my bidding, so it's not all bad.

items.name: Twisted Dagger Focus
items.description: Allows me to focus my fiendish magic.

items.name: Demonic Focus of Infernal Power
items.description: I'll do whatever it takes to achieve my goals.

items.name: Small Cloth Pouch
items.description: Holds enough components for a few hours of intense spellcasting.

items.name: Stitched Leather Pouch
items.description: There's a hidden compartment in the back for even more components.

items.name: Dyed Leather Pouch
items.description: Finding black leather dye is extremely difficult. Luckily, I know a Fiend or two.

items.name: Gilded Demon Hide Pouch
items.description: Demon hide is especially rare. They generally don't like to give it up.

items.name: Torn Cape
items.description: They... they tore my cape! The nerve!

items.name: Dark Cape
items.description: I'm really still quite evil, once you get to know me.

items.name: Magnificent Cape
items.description: Magnificent, much like myself!

items.name: Exquisite Cape of Souls
items.description: Don't worry, they weren't very nice souls to begin with.

items.name: Basic Warlock's Robe
items.description: This has no real value to me. I've grown so far beyond its meager power.

items.name: Apprentice's Robe
items.description: A simple robe for a simple warlock. I've already outgrown it.

items.name: Gold Stitched Robe
items.description: Finally, a robe worthy of my great power.

items.name: Tasselled Robes of Justification
items.description: The ends justify the means. I'll do whatever it takes.

items.name: Charred Belt
items.description: You can't make an omelette without burning a few belts.

items.name: Blackened Belt
items.description: For some reason, my patron seems to like it when I wear black.

items.name: Fine Acolyte's Belt
items.description: A rare gift from my patron, Arikas. It serves me well.

items.name: Skirted Belt of Demons
items.description: An exquisite belt for those of us with fiendish tastes.

data.backstory: Tyril grew up in the wilds around his home village as the apprentice to the spiritual leader. After an accident regarding his large stature, Tyril fled the village to become a sword for hire. His regret informs his transformations and he prefers to shape-shift into small mammals and rodents.

items.name: Splintered Branch
items.description: Even a splintered branch can do damage in the right hands.

items.name: Patched Tree Branch

items.name: Twisted Wooden Staff
items.description: The twisting only serves to make it stronger.

items.name: Gnarled Staff of the Warden
items.description: The tree this staff came from is older than time itself.

items.name: Dull Jade Necklace
items.description: A simple necklace for simple adventurers.

items.name: Shiny Jade Necklace
items.description: There's something about jade that always tickles my fancy.

items.name: Fine Jade Necklace
items.description: A fine necklace purchased from a merchant in Triboar.

items.name: Woven Jade Necklace of the Forest
items.description: An ancient necklace found deep in the Neverwinter wood.

items.name: Plain Rope
items.description: Fifty feet of strong hempen rope. Durable and versatile.

items.name: Twitching Rope
items.description: It seems to want something... What do you want, little rope?

items.name: Magical Rope
items.description: Good for getting to high places when there's nothing to tie rope to.

items.name: Plain Cloth Vest
items.description: A workable vest. Relatively new and uninitiated to nature.

items.name: Fine Cloth Shirt
items.description: A fine shirt. I almost feel bad taking it out into the wild. Almost.

items.name: Earthwarden's Shirt of Nature
items.description: One of the few items I kept from my home village after... Nevermind.

items.name: Empty Bag of Tricks

items.name: Mystical Tan Bag of Tricks

items.name: Wooden Ring
items.description: Crafted from a fallen branch donated by a very old and wise tree.

items.name: Basic Ring of the Mole
items.description: Moles have one of the keenest noses in the world, you know.

items.name: Fine Ring of the Frog
items.description: Frogs have many fine attributes that are quite useful when adventuring.

items.name: Exquisite Ring of the Porcupine
items.description: Much like the Porcupine, if you poke me, you'll regret it.

data.backstory: Jamilah is a Human Barbarian, played by actor (and part time DM) Deborah Ann Woll, and the second brand-new Force Grey character added this season. Shipwrecked as a young child, Jamilah washed up on the shores of Chult. Luckily, the people of this forbidding land took her in and raised her as one of their own. Having grown into a strong and confident young woman, she now longs to leave Chult and explore other lands, challenging anyone along her way to arm wrestling or thigh crushing contests of might.

abilities.name: Unarmored Defense

data.backstory: Arkhan the Cruel is a dragonborn oathbreaker paladin in the service of the five-headed dragon goddess Tiamat. Due to 'The Wreath of the Prism' that he wears around his neck, he has gained control of the vicious manticore Chango.

raw.tip_text: Arkhan attacks more ferociously when there are more enemies attacking him. Place him in your front line!
raw.name: Rage of the Dragonborn

description.desc: When 6+ Enemies are attacking $source, his base attack gains a small cleave and does 5x damage. When 16+ Enemies are attacking, his base attack is a massive flame breath attack that does 25x damage. Counts each enemy enrage stack as an additional attacker.$only_when_purchased (Current Attackers: $num_attacking_monsters)

abilities.desc: Arkhan attacks more ferociously when there are more enemies attacking him. Place him in your front line!.

ult.description: Arkhan breaths deadly dragon fire on a cone of enemies.
ult.long_description: Arkhan rushes forward to the nearest enemy and breaths dragon fire on them and all enemies in a large cone.
ult.name: Flame Breath

base.description: Arkhan attacks the closest enemy with the fury of Tiamat.

data.backstory: Hitch started off life on the wrong foot and the wrong side of the wagon tracks. Besides the Sword Coast, the only other place he's ever called home is Durpar in Southeast Faerûn, which has been conquered by goblinoids allied with Durpar's ruling merchant house. Now, he tries to keep two steps ahead of his shady past, avoiding run-ins with the Zhentarim and other nefarious acquaintances. With his quick wit and roguish charm, Hitch plans to somehow land on his feet, on a pile of gold, with a treasure map in each hand, but until then he needs all the friends he can get.

abilities.name: Natural Performer

data.backstory: Born Stami Gackle, she fled her home after a terrible accident at a young age and joined a monastery of the Even-Handed to study ki. An adept monk and extremely capable adventurer, her thoughtful approach to problems has earned her a reputation as an uncommonly stoic Rock Gnome.

raw.tip_text: Stoki leaves a Mark of Ki on enemies she attacks, and then buffs the formation based on the number of active Marks of Ki.
raw.name: Ki Strike

description.desc: Enemies attacked by Stoki gain a Mark of Ki. Stoki increases the damage of all Champions on the edge of the formation by $(not_buffed amount___2)% for every Mark of Ki active

abilities.desc: Stoki leaves a Mark of Ki on enemies she attacks, and then buffs the formation based on the number of active Marks of Ki.

raw.tip_text: Enemies killed by Champions adjacent to Stoki drop bonus gold based on the number of active Marks of Ki.

ult.long_description: Stoki leaps out and attacks five random enemies with extremely powerful palm thrusts. Over the next 10 seconds, all affected enemies take massive damage over time.

data.backstory: Born to an academic female human wizard who was researching an orc tribe and the vicious leader of said tribe, Krond has experience in both worlds. Raised as a fearsome warrior, he began focusing on the arcane arts after his mother was killed in a goblin raid. He carries a bonded warhammer named Unity. After a year of being looked down on during his travels, Krond has embraced his Orcish side and is now Chaotic Evil.

raw.name: Eldritch Strike

ult.name: Arcane Charge

data.backstory: Extremely elderly for a Tortle, Gromma Nander grew discontent with her secluded life after giving birth to her offspring. Once they were old enough to fend for themselves, she ventured back out into the world to learn as much as she could about the strange creatures that inhabit it. Gromma is a wise and inquisitive Tortle who is quick to friendship but slow to trust. She carries a pouch of smooth colored stones that she has collected on her journey and walks with the aid of a battle-worn spear.

data.backstory: Dhadius is a mage of legendary status and acclaim (at least, in his own mind), who sees everyone else as intellectual worms. Being an egomaniac, he seeks out esoteric lore and rare magical secrets so he may know things that the 'common fools' do not. Dhadius hails from Luskan in the north, where he is a member of the Arcane Brotherhood, an infamous group of wizards. He joined them only recently and hasn't been taken as seriously by the others as he thinks he should be. He's determined to let it be known far and wide that he is a wizard to be respected and feared.

raw.tip_text: Dhadius's Skill Empowerment spell affects all Champions within 2 formation slots of himself. Place intelligent Champions near Dhadius to make use of his blunder.

items.description: Provides some deflection, I suppose. Not that I need it.

items.name: Arcane Bracer
items.description: Empowers my already formidable magical abilities.

items.name: Wonderous Bracer of the Greatest Wizard
items.description: Well, if you say so.

items.name: Ratty Cloak
items.description: It'll do until I can get back into my usual wardrobe.

items.name: Apprentice's Cloak
items.description: It's not mine, I'm just borrowing it.

items.name: Velvet Cloak
items.description: Velvet is the hallmark of impressive wizards, you know.

items.name: Flowing Cloak of the Respected Wizard
items.description: I am respected, aren't I?

items.name: Tin Ring
items.description: In the hands of an amazing wizard such as myself, even a simple ring can be powerful.

items.name: Shiny Iron Ring
items.description: It may not look like much - or be much, for that matter - but it's mine, so it's impressive.

items.name: Frosted Ring
items.description: Just a single touch can turn a man to ice. Or make them somewhat chilly, at least.

items.name: Frozen Ring of the Proven Wizard
items.description: Not that I have to prove myself to anyone.

items.name: Cracked Staff
items.description: Nothing a little ingenuity can't fix.

items.name: Glowing Staff
items.description: If your staff isn't glowing, you're not wizarding right.

items.name: Shining Staff
items.description: Shining like the statue of me in the Luskan harbour will be. Once I get my due.

items.name: Brilliant Staff of the Legendary Wizard
items.description: Are you sure 'legendary' is the right word? It seems too simple to me.

items.name: Dull Amulet
items.description: The Arcane Brotherhood's symbol should never be displayed so dimly.

items.name: Sparking Amulet
items.description: It's a little difficult to handle. Shocks you when you touch it.

items.name: Onyx Arcane Brotherhood Amulet
items.description: A wonderful symbol of the Brotherhood.

items.name: Master's Amulet of the Arcane Brotherhood
items.description: I certainly wouldn't want to assume a rank, but that sounds about right.

data.backstory: Despite his increasing fame (or infamy) across the Sword Coast North as a drow who dwells on the surface, is deadly in battle, fights with great agility and two enchanted scimitars, and can call on an onyx panther figurine of wondrous power to bring a battle companion to his side, Drizzt Do'Urden remains an enigma. Thoughtful and sensitive to others, Drizzt holds himself to the highest ideals but does not expect the same of others. Ever alert for treachery and danger, he speaks little but is apt to be polite (if terse) in his dealings. A perfectionist who yearns to be accepted into places and groups and to make friends widely, Drizzt is haunted by the danger he brings to those he befriends thanks to the scrutiny of Lolth and his other foes (notably the demon Errtu and the human Artemis Entreri). Those he meets see his manner as grim.

data.backstory: A proud daughter of Clan Undurr and a devout follower of Gorm Gulthyn, the dwarven god of vigilance and duty. She spent fifteen years in the city of Ironmaster, in Icewind Dale, overseeing and protecting her family's investment in the city's lucrative mining operations. However, she saw little action and feared that her talents were being squandered. She has recently found a home within a budding organization called the Order of the Gauntlet, which vigilantly guards against the rise of evil in all its forms.

data.backstory: As a poor urchin on the streets of Calimport, Regis quickly learned that survival often requires bending the rules in your favor. He fled to the north to avoid capture after stealing his former master's magical ruby pendant. Eventually, he found companionship amongst the Companions of the Hall, becoming one of Bruenor Battlehammer's most trusted confidants. Bruenor was the one who gifted Regis with the nickname 'Rumblebelly' due to the halfling's insatiable appetite. Regis would prefer nothing more than to relax in the sun with a full belly near his home in Ten-Towns and fish for knucklehead trout, the source of all of his scrimshaw carvings. But when his friends need help, Regis is always there for them. He never sees himself as the hero, even though his true friends know better.

data.backstory: Birdsong, a cunning young Tabaxi bard, learned to defend herself while enslaved by the Yuan-ti. Proficient in playing the lute, Birdsong discovered her potential as a bard when witnessing the effect her songs had on other slaves. After her escape, she became one of the greatest minstrels of Chult. She promised herself to, one day, get revenge on the Yuan-ti who destroyed her village.

data.backstory: Zorbu grew up in a small village on the slopes of the mountains south of Yartar. He lived a typical gnomish childhood: tinkering with mechanical toys, pulling pranks on unsuspecting neighbors, and exploring the woodlands covering the mountains in the company of a local dwarf ranger, Galor Rockshield. One night an army of drow and their minions descended upon the village in force. Galor saved Zorbu's life, but many others were killed, including Zorbu's parents. From that day forth, Zorbu trained under Galor as a ranger, vowing revenge upon the drow and any who claim allegiance to them. Cunning and imaginative, Zorbu makes use of his tinkering skills to wield an impossibly large crossbow called Thunderbolt.

data.backstory: The sorcerer known as Strix hails from Sigil, the City of Doors at the center of the multiverse. Very little is known of Strix's heritage, even to herself, but it was recently discovered that she was a powerful member of the Skizziks family, who long ago made a pact with Asmodeus, ruler of the Nine Hells, to become Tieflings. Strix is careful, suspicious, and paranoid. She assumes the worst in everyone and is always ready to run away or hide. She lacks basic manners and maintains poor personal hygiene, exemplified by the collection of filthy oddities she hoards within her robes. As a child, Strix witnessed a shadowy creature slaughter her friends at the bakery where she worked, but was spared for unknown reasons. Her survivor's guilt drives her to try and help those in need, no matter the personal cost.

data.backstory: Having watched your party's progress for many years from Limbo, the Great Githzera, Zaerith Menyar-Ag-Gith, has dispatched Nrakk to join your party on the Material Plane. Though his true motivations are unknown, Nrakk is a masterful Kensai monk whose kensei weapon Naginata is a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield. Reserved and aloof, Nrakk sometimes has a hard time interacting with those he sees as his lessers, but he nevertheless seems committed to the party's cause.

raw.tip_text: Nrakk gains Ki Points when attacking, making him attack faster and do more damage.

data.backstory: Catti-brie is a kind, tolerant, and pragmatic warrior. She has spent much of her life adventuring with the legendary Companions of the Hall, accompanying Drizzt Do'Urden, Bruenor Battlehammer, Regis, and Wulfgar on numerous escapades. As the moral compass of the group, Catti-brie helps guide her companions to wise actions through common sense and clear insight. She wields the legendary bow Taulmaril, which shoots silver arrows.

data.backstory: Caring, motherly, and endlessly optimistic, Evelyn has adventured across the realms as part of the Waffle Crew for many years. She's always first in battle, thanks to her flying boots, and will always take a hit to protect others. Short, yet tough, her devotion to Lathander has seen her through many perilous situations.

data.backstory: A grumpy and headstrong dwarf with a penchant for springing traps rather than disarming them, if Binwin's not the first into battle then he's disappointed. There's nary a door, tankard, or acid pit that hasn't felt the wrath of Binwin Bronzebottom at one time or another.

abilities.name: Extra Attacks

raw.tip_text: Binwin can attack multiple times per attack, doing more damage with each attack. He excels against large groups of durable enemies.
raw.name: Extra Attacks

conditions.desc: Binwin gains extra attacks when Champions within 2 slots of him do a certain number of attacks before Binwin's next attack. Each Extra Attack does $amount% more damage (multiplicatively)$only_when_purchased^^$binwin_extra_attacks_desc

data.backstory: A former member of the Dripping Fang clan, Deekin was once a Skald for a White Dragon named Tymofarrar. Once he was released from Tymofarrar's service, he set out to become the most amazing storyteller in all of Faerûn. He yearns to sing and tell stories of heroic deeds, but his songs often devolve into 'tales' of the doom that is coming to him or his companions.

data.backstory: Fascinated by magic at a young age when he lived in an orphanage, but lacking any ability or proficiency, Xander is not terribly good at much of anything, though something about his adorable clumsiness and childlike wonder anytime magic is being used nearby has been known to inspire those around him. Until recently, he was living on the streets of Waterdeep, scraping together just enough to survive. Now, he is a faithful member of your party, always ready to leap into the fray, even if he doesn't really seem to be able to hit much of anything.

data.backstory: Azaka Stormfang was once a guide who operated out of Port Nyanzaru on Chult. She originally concealed her curse of lycanthropy from the champions, as she has lost many friends to that revelation in the past. Her true self was revealed to the Champions after she valiantly helped them collect 3 of the 9 puzzle cubes they needed to defeat the villain Acererak in the Tomb of the Nine Gods. She was killed in the battle, but was able to be resurrected after the champions defeated Acererak's soulmonger. Now, she travels with her new friends, as a champion.

If Azaka specs with Lycanthrope Forever the tiger attacks count towards her weretiger transformation, and her weretiger cooldown is paused during her Ultimate. If she specs with Resist the Curse, the tigers' attacks cause enemies to drop gold even if they aren't killed.

data.backstory: Ishi Snaggletooth hails from a warren of Kobolds living in the sewers under Baldur's Gate. Always the type to be more curious than careful, she accidentally stowed away on a ship headed to Port Nyanzaru. There, she met her dear friend, the Firbolg Littlefox. Often shunned by humans, Ishi hopes to prove herself as a true hero however she can. Ishi's biggest claim to fame is the defeat of the known swordsman, Hershel Von Saberburg, and since that day she's touted herself as a renowned duelist to anyone that'll listen to her.

data.backstory: Wulfgar started his life in the north as the flag bearer of the barbarian Tribe of the Elk. He was bested in the assault on Ten-Towns by Bruenor who decided his punishment would be five years and a day of service. Bruenor grew to love the tall barbarian, eventually seeing him as an adopted son. At the end of his service, Drizzt Do'Urden taught Wulfgar the ways of combat and Bruenor crafted a mighty warhammer, named Aegis-fang. This magical warhammer bears the symbols of three of the Dwarven Gods: Moradin, Clangeddin, and Dumathoin. It is specifically attuned to Wulfgar and magically returns to his hand upon telepathic command.

ult.description: Shouting the name of his deity, Wulfgar tosses his warhammer, Aegis-fang, at the most distant enemy, dealing damage to and stunning all enemies in a line for 10 seconds.
ult.long_description: Shouting the name of his deity, Wulfgar tosses his warhammer, Aegis-fang, at the most distant enemy, dealing damage to and stunning all enemies in a line for 10 seconds.
ult.name: Aegis-fang

base.description: Wulfgar smashes the nearest group of enemies with his warhammer.

items.name: Lopsided Warhammer
items.description: It curves to the right. Make sure to compensate.

items.name: Balanced Warhammer
items.description: It returns to my hand every time. It is truly magical.

items.name: Dwarven-made Warhammer
items.description: It contains the symbols of 3 dwarven gods: Clangeddin, Dumathoin, and Moradin.

items.name: Aegis-fang
items.description: Crafted by Bruenor Battlehammer himself.

items.name: Discarded Iron Hair Clip
items.description: I found it while exploring one day. It keeps my hair out of my face.

items.name: Steel Hair Clip
items.description: I learned much in my time with Bruenor and the dwarves of Mithral Hall.

items.name: Dwarven Hair Clip
items.description: Clangeddin's symbol rests with weight upon my chest.

items.name: Golden Clangeddin Hair Clip
items.description: While no Tempus, the dwarven god of war and valor is an honorable deity to follow.

items.name: Ancient Dagger
items.description: On days when my fingers freeze, I wish this could appear as Aegis-fang does.

items.name: Trusty Dagger
items.description: Icewind Dale is a harsh environment. A good dagger can save your life.

items.name: Balanced Dagger
items.description: Just don't use it to clean off ore unless you want to spend a tenday sharpening it.

items.name: Dagger of the Elk
items.description: The Tribe of the Elk need sturdy weapons such as this. It is key to their survival.

items.name: Torn Banner
items.description: A relic of my first life with the Tribe of the Elk. It still gives me chills.

items.name: Wind-Scarred Banner
items.description: It has marched across Icewind Dale hundreds of times.

items.name: Tribal Banner
items.description: Make your mark. Mark your home. Defend it with your life.

items.name: Banner of the Tribe of the Elk
items.description: I am Wulfgar, Son of Beornegar, of the Tribe of the Elk.

items.name: Shards of Dragon Scales
items.description: Ingeloakastimizilian, the white dragon is more commonly referred to as: Icingdeath.

items.name: Trinkets of Icingdeath
items.description: I collected these from the corpse of Icingdeath, the white dragon of Icewind Dale.

items.name: Dragon Scale Bracelet
items.description: A small reminder of the battle between Drizzt, myself, and Icingdeath

items.name: Icingdeath Bracer
items.description: To truly understand what we went through, you have to understand true fear.

items.name: Worn Wolf Cloak
items.description: Icewind Dale is cold and unforgiving. Stay warm if you want to stay alive.

items.name: New Wolf Cloak
items.description: It still smells of battle.

items.name: Ten-Towns Cloak
items.description: The battle against Akar Kessel was the first time I felt truly heroic.

items.name: Chieftain's Cloak
items.description: Perhaps someday. . .

data.backstory: Abandoned as an infant and adopted by an outcast dragonborn warrior, Farideh grew to adulthood acutely aware of the drawbacks of being a tiefling. While those from the Nine Hells do their utmost to corrupt her, Farideh isn't interested in power so much as defending the world from demons, the undead, and any other villains trying to bring trouble or drag her friends and family into danger.

abilities.name: Hellish Rebuke

conditions.desc: Enemies that hit $target or Champions within 2 slots distance of $target take Damage equal to $amount% of $source_hero's DPS
Enemies that hit $target or Champions adjacent to $target take Damage equal to $amount% of $source_hero's DPS
Enemies that hit $target take Damage equal to $amount% of $source_hero's DPS

abilities.desc: Enemies that hit Farideh take Damage equal to 20% of Farideh's DPS.

abilities.desc: Farideh's damage is increased by the number of tieflings in the formation. Load up your formation with tieflings to really power her up!.

items.name: Small Holy Symbol
items.description: It's tarnished, but it's a comfort...Maybe I won't tell Mehen though.

items.name: Symbol of Selûne
items.description: The Moonmaiden Selûne helps me navigate my fate.

items.name: Selûne and Nanna-Sin Pendant
items.description: The other side shows the axe of the Untheran god who protects Djerad Kethendi.

items.name: Amulet of Selûne
items.description: A gift from Tam, when we were in the ruins of Neverwinter.

items.name: Pact Focus
items.description: This makes it much easier to channel my pact.

items.name: Sentimental Rod
items.description: A gift from Dahl. It's not pretty, but it means a lot.

items.name: Rod of the Traitor's Reprisal
items.description: Lorcan gave me this to help protect from devils. They definitely don't like it.

items.name: Ruby Rod of Asmodeus
items.description: ...I don't think I'm supposed to have this. Am I supposed to have this? Better not drop it.

items.name: Used Grimoire
items.description: Ritual books are expensive! This is all I could afford.

items.name: Lorcan's Grimoire
items.description: It's supposed to help my pact, but I much prefer the rod.

items.name: Book of Shadows
items.description: This is eveything I need, except it reminds me of the Shadovar and Adolican Rhand.

items.name: Book of Promises
items.description: Dahl and I burned the old one. New memories, new spells!

items.name: Flimsy Armor
items.description: Better than nothing! Maybe next bounty we'll get enough to go shopping.

items.name: Warlock Armor
items.description: Good coverage and flexible. My sister, Havilar, says it's dumpy.

items.name: Shadow Armor
items.description: I pretty much vanish between its dark colors and the shadow-smoke.

items.name: Armor of Khorsaya
items.description: A gift from Verthisathurgiesh, my adoptive clan. It's dragonborn armor, cut for me.

items.name: Water-Damaged Deck
items.description: This Wroth Deck has seen better days, but it still freaks out shadar-kai!

items.name: Deck of Fortune Cards
items.description: Dahl gave me these for patience games, but they feel eerie.

items.name: The Adversary
items.description: This one card keeps coming up, even when I try to bury it.

items.name: Nightmare Wroth Deck
items.description: This...isn't my deck. I dream of this one when Asmodeus wants something.

items.name: Torn Chapbook
items.description: My sister is so rough on her things. I can't even read the title.

items.name: The Prince of Al-Qadim
items.description: This one is one of Havi's boyfriend Brin's favorites.

items.name: Red Bess and the Kelpie's Regret
items.description: Havi says this story is basically me and Lorcan. I don't want to read it.

items.name: Havi's Chapbook
items.description: ...Karshoj, those bookmarks better not be for me.

data.backstory: This copper, draconic gentleman claims to know more than one hundred different dragons. Chromatic, metallic -- just tons and tons of dragons -- I'm hoping we can leverage some of these connections in our dealings. None of the dragons I've contacted have gotten back to me, but they're probably just very busy right now. This is one of the busiest times for dragons... or so I've been told by my new best friend, Donaar Blit'zen.

abilities.name: Lead By Example

raw.tip_text: Donaar buffs Champions in the same column and columns behind him. Place him near the front of your formation to gain the biggest benefit.
raw.name: Lead By Example

ult.description: Donaar attacks the nearest enemies with his comically oversized sword, then vomits acid.

ult.name: Acid Vomit

items.description: This was my brother's cape, I brought it with me when I left Jinaar. I don't want to talk about it.

data.backstory: Fate Weaver, Spy mistress, New Olamn college of whispers instructor, Band Manager of Sirens of the Realms & Magic Missile, long time pal of Durnan. This noble looking Eladrin Elf has friends in high and low places. Her true origins are unknown though it is rumored she traveled across Faerûn with a bard troupe and learned about the world one tavern at a time.

data.backstory: Forged to be the jailer for a prison filled with eldritch horrors in a faraway land, Warden became corrupted by the monstrosities they sought to keep locked away. Now they journey at the behest of an otherworldly master, seeking souls for the insatiable Dark Hunger to corrupt and feast upon.

data.backstory: Nerys Kathon joined the Heroes of Baldur's Gate on a mission to protect her church, but was soon pulled into a harrowing journey to Barovia and beyond. As a cleric of Kelemvor, she grew up in service to the dying and the dead and developed a cold detachment to anything outside of duties to her faith. Beneath that frosty exterior is a loyal and caring adventurer, but it's a side she rarely shows to anyone outside her closest friends.
