items.description: I have devoted all I have to the Lord of the Dead.

items.name: Blessed Greatsword of Kelemvor
items.description: Death comes to all. Until it's my time, I will do Kelemvor's will.

items.name: Rusty Breastplate
items.description: One would be fool hearty to head into battle without the proper protection.

items.name: Worn Breastplate
items.description: It has protected me against blades and arrows.

items.name: Adamantine Breastplate
items.description: Some say the skull is unnerving. For me, it's a comfort.

items.name: Breastplate of the Devout Cleric
items.description: My faith sustains me. My friends give me reasons to fight on when all seems lost.

items.name: Dark Eyeshadow Components
items.description: The darkness surrounding my eyes strikes fear in those I fix with my stare.

items.name: Crushed Charcoal Eyeshadow
items.description: Just make sure it's cooled first. You only make that mistake once.

items.name: Shea Nut Butter Eyeshadow
items.description: It took me quite a while to find a mixture that stays on during the heat of battle.

items.name: Arrowroot Eyeshadow
items.description: I save this eyeshadow for the right occasion.

items.name: Patched Together Cloak
items.description: I used to not care as much about my cloak. Then we landed in the tundra.

items.name: Fur Cloak
items.description: I trust Kelemvor will protect me until it is time for me to pass into his care.

items.name: Wolf Fur Cloak
items.description: The beast that supplied the fur has gone onto Kelemvor. I thank it for it's sacrifice.

items.name: Cloak of the Wolf
items.description: With the correct gear, the Heroes of Baldur's Gate can weather any storm.

items.name: Cracked Kelemvor Symbol
items.description: I cracked it fighting a wave of undead. It reminds me to never let my guard down.

items.name: Ancient Kelemvor Relic
items.description: How many people were comforted by this on their way to the Lord of the Dead?

items.name: Holy Symbol of Kelemvor
items.description: The scales, like most things in life, must be balanced. Death comes for us all.

items.name: Ostentatious Symbol of Kelemvor
items.description: The gold used to make this symbol could have been put to use in better ways.

items.name: Ancient Locket
items.description: It was found among priceless relics of the Kelemvor faith. It was not of Toril.

items.name: Barovian Locket
items.description: The mists that carried us to Barovia are somehow tied to this locket.

items.name: Locket of Protection
items.description: This locket has protective energy, but more research is required to unlock its power.

items.name: Sergei's Soul Bound Locket
items.description: A soul that couldn't pass on saved us from the vampire. I hope his soul now rests.

data.backstory: Curious, affable, and morbid, the drow heretic K'thriss Drow'b seeks the insane god-truth behind the veil of reality. As the 'C' Team's hoardsperson, he keeps an eye out for occult relics that could aid him in his unearthly quest.

abilities.name: Hoardsperson

raw.tip_text: K'thriss collects some of the formation's earnings, but don't fret -- he uses it to summon a helpful demon!
raw.name: Hoardsperson

description.desc: Reduces gold find by $amount___2%, but increases the damage of all Champions by $amount%. Collect bonus coins to summon a demon that massively buffs the damage of your lowest damage Champion for 30 seconds. $hordesperson_description

abilities.desc: K'thriss collects some of the formation's earnings, but don't fret -- he uses it to summon a helpful demon!.

abilities.name: Unseen Encouragement

raw.tip_text: K'thriss buffs those farthest from him in the formation. He can be tricky to position, but is a powerful buffer!
raw.name: Unseen Encouragement

conditions.desc: Increase the damage of the champions not adjacent to K'thriss by $amount%
Increase the damage of the champions furthest from K'thriss by $amount%

abilities.desc: K'thriss buffs those farthest from him in the formation. He can be tricky to position, but is a powerful buffer!.

ult.description: K'thriss summons a horde of tentacles that damage and slow all enemies.
ult.long_description: K'thriss summons a horde of tentacles across the battlefield that damage and slow all enemies.
ult.name: Tentacular Spectacular

base.description: K'thriss telepathically whispers a discordant melody that damages and slows a random enemy.
base.name: Dissonant Whispers

effects: Increases the damage of all Champions by 100%.
Increases the damage of all Female Champions by 125%.
Increases the damage of all Elf Champions by 150%.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 20% for each Champion with a INT score of 11 or higher in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 40% for each Champion with a CHA score of 15 or higher in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Magic Champions by 150%.

data.name: K'thriss

items.name: Book of Shadows
items.description: It still makes that peculiar shriek when opened.

items.name: Tome of Forgotten Lore
items.description: If I have it here, is it still forgotten?

items.name: Codex of the Hoardsperson
items.description: Written in a strange tongue that includes pivot tables.

items.name: Library of the Unknowable
items.description: I have stopped adding entries to it. It now adds its own entries to me.

items.name: Worn Coverup
items.description: In keeping with the custom of concealing one's body.

items.name: Rumpled Robe of Recognition
items.description: Recognition begets knowledge, memory, truth. Do you have any truths for me?

items.name: Cloak of Stars
items.description: Some say it's a knockoff, but we cannot rule out jealousy.

items.name: Shroud of the Planes
items.description: As cold and ephemeral as the mist itself!

items.name: Dusty Satchel
items.description: The plainest of containers for corporeal goods.

items.name: Pouch of Acquisitions
items.description: Walnut told me I have to wear this as part of the uniform.

items.name: Animated Bag of Holding
items.description: A bag with its own aspirations. Novel!

items.name: Vault of Mouths
items.description: Oh, one that hungers. You shall feast this day.

items.name: Threadbare Spirit
items.description: A simple rag renders the unseen seen!

items.name: Unseen Servant with Cozy
items.description: Should you require warmth, this cloth should suffice!

items.name: Velvet the Softest Ghost
items.description: Kind Velvet, please do as I ask.

items.name: High-Pile Velvet
items.description: A thread count beyond mortal ken. Dry clean only.

items.name: Tentacular Remnant
items.description: It once served a god of mouths.

items.name: Ligotti
items.description: Has it accepted me as its new master?

items.name: Staff of Ligotti
items.description: You are full of useful shapes, my boy!

items.name: Scythe of Ligotti
items.description: A tool to cleave comforting lies from wretched truth.

items.name: Altar Fragment
items.description: As if it does not want to be deciphered!

items.name: Glyph of Mysteries
items.description: From some dark, illimitable alphabet.

items.name: Arcane Focus of the Ur
items.description: My eyes have opened! The unfathomable eidolon!

items.name: Tetrathanotic Key
items.description: All knowledge begins with these four lines.

data.backstory: Paultin and his 'son' Simon (AKA Murderbot) have been adventuring as part of the Waffle Crew for many years. Paultin is a wise-cracking adventurer who is more at home at a tavern than anywhere else. He cares deeply for those he considers his friends and will leap into action if anyone hurts them.

abilities.name: Lucky

raw.tip_text: Paultin increases your party's gold find for each Champion adjacent to him.
raw.name: Lucky

description.desc: $source increases the party's gold find by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Champion adjacent to them.

abilities.desc: Paultin increases your party's gold find for each Champion adjacent to him.

abilities.name: Magical Secrets

raw.tip_text: Paultin increases the damage of everyone not adjacent to him, based on the number of Champions that ARE adjacent to him!
raw.name: Magical Secrets

effect_keys.old_unused_override_key_desc: Increases the Damage of $target by $amount% for every Champion adjacent to Paultin

description.desc: Paultin increases the damage of Champions not adjacent to him by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Champion that IS adjacent to him.

abilities.desc: Paultin increases the damage of everyone not adjacent to him, based on the number of Champions that ARE adjacent to him!.

abilities.name: Stronger Together

effect_keys.override_key_desc: Increases the damage of $target by $(not_buffed amount)% for every $(describe_tags tag) champion in the formation (multiplicative).  Total increased by $(upgrade_bonus 2037)%

description.desc: Increase the damage of Waffle Crew members in the formation by $(not_buffed amount)% for each member of the Waffle Crew in the formation. (multiplicative, then buffed by $(upgrade_bonus 2037)%)

abilities.desc: Increase the damage of Waffle Crew members in the formation by 150% for each member of the Waffle Crew in the formation. (multiplicative, then buffed by W, A, F, F, L, E, C, R, E and W%).

abilities.name: Edgy

description.desc: Increase the effect of Magical Secrets by $amount% if $source is on the edge of the formation.

abilities.desc: Increase the effect of Magical Secrets by 100% if Paultin is on the edge of the formation.

ult.description: Paultin swings the Sunsword, creating a shockwave that deals massive damage to all enemies.
ult.long_description: Paultin swings the Sunsword, dealing massive damage to all enemies. The damage is increased by the current enemy enrage multiplier.
ult.name: Thunderwave

base.description: Simon attacks with a poisoned dart. Paultin attacks too, sometimes.
base.name: Poison Dart

effects: Increases the damage of all Champions by 10% for each Champion in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Male Champions by 125%.
Increases the damage of all Human Champions by 150%.
Increases the damage of all Champions with a CON score of 13 or higher by 150%.
Increases the damage of all Champions with a CHA score of 15 or higher by 200%.
Increases the damage of all Chaotic Champions by 150%.

data.name: Paultin

items.name: Patchwork Bagpipes
items.description: Common bagpipes with a goat skin bag.

items.name: Blackwood Bagpipes
items.description: These bagpipes have blackwood pipes for a more uniform sound.

items.name: Bagpipes of the Traveling Bard
items.description: The Rusty Pommel wasn't that seedy of a tavern, was it?

items.name: Barovian Ceremonial Bagpipes
items.description: Did I ever tell you about the time I turned into a spirit raven and met the Raven Queen?

items.name: Questionable Wineskin
items.description: It's mostly better than box wine. Mostly.

items.name: Heavily-used Wineskin
items.description: There really aren't a lot of wine options in Barovia.

items.name: Minstrel's Wineskin
items.description: Simon! Can you fetch Dad some more wine?

items.name: Wizards of the Wineskin
items.description: The best cure for a hangover is to keep drinking.

items.name: Broken Antique Chair
items.description: Both creepy AND comfortable!

items.name: Animated Gothic Chair
items.description: A perfect drinking chair.

items.name: Strahd von Chairovich
items.description: This really was a great idea. I like drunk Strix.

items.name: Champion Strahd von Chairovich
items.description: Chair Richten never had a chance.

items.name: Leather Keepsake Necklace
items.description: An old cog and a family signet ring, bound by a leather strap.

items.name: Memento Necklace
items.description: A clockwork machine piece and a noble family signet ring.

items.name: Golden Cog & Marthain Signet
items.description: These aren't just trinkets - they are pieces of her soul.

items.name: Soulmate Necklace
items.description: You're back now. That's what matters.

items.name: Iron Hilt
items.description: This old hilt appears to have once had a crystal blade

items.name: Platinum Hilt
items.description: The initials 'S.V.Z' are engraved upon the pommel.

items.name: The Sunsword
items.description: Ezmerelda's final gift.

items.name: Sunsword of Sergei von Zarovich
items.description: It's not every day you stab your shadow and get shot back through time.

items.name: Weathered Mandolin
items.description: This mandolin is out of tune.

items.name: Mandolin of the Vistani
items.description: A well-tuned mandolin.

items.name: Ornate Canaith Mandolin
items.description: I lost this during 'Bomb Voyage' trying to save my friends. Again.

items.name: Jesper's Prized Mandolin
items.description: I'll put this to better use than Jesper ever could.

data.backstory: The Black Viper was a notorious burglar, pickpocket, mugger, and assassin who died a century ago, after a long and nefarious career. Esvele Rosznar, a brash young noble, has recently adopted the Black Viper's persona to lead a secret life of crime. Like many other nobles, Esvele gossips about the Black Viper's exploits to lend credence to the villain's mystique.

abilities.name: Jewel Thief

raw.tip_text: Black Viper powers up over time by collecting Red Gems. Red Gems have both a permanent effect that persists between runs and a damage bonus that applies to the current run.
raw.name: Jewel Thief

conditions.desc: Adds a 33% chance that a Red Gem will drop from a boss loot sack. Each Red Gem collected in the current adventure grants a  12.5% damage bonus stacking multiplicatively. Each Red Gem collected across all adventures permanently unlocks additional bonuses.

Adds a 25% chance that a Red Gem will drop from a boss loot sack. Each Red Gem collected in the current adventure grants a  10% damage bonus stacking multiplicatively. Each Red Gem collected across all adventures permanently unlocks additional bonuses.
$jewel_thief_description

abilities.desc: Black Viper powers up over time by collecting Red Gems. Red Gems have both a permanent effect that persists between runs and a damage bonus that applies to the current run.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack

conditions.desc: Black Viper deals $amount% more damage the first or second time she attacks an enemy. Black Viper attacks 0.5s faster after she Sneak Attacks.
Black Viper deals $amount% more damage the first time she attacks an enemy.

abilities.desc: Black Viper deals 100% more damage the first time she attacks an enemy.

abilities.name: Aura of Infamy

raw.tip_text: Black Viper is buffed more effectively by Bards, Rogues, and eventually Rangers and Warlocks. Build a formation with those classes to make the best use of her.
raw.name: Aura of Infamy

conditions.desc: All positional Formation Abilities $target receives from Warlocks, Rangers, Rogues, and Bards are buffed by $amount%.
All positional Formation Abilities $target receives from Rogues and Bards are buffed by $amount%.

abilities.desc: Black Viper is buffed more effectively by Bards, Rogues, and eventually Rangers and Warlocks. Build a formation with those classes to make the best use of her.

abilities.name: Distracted Foes

conditions.desc: When other Champions are attacked, Black Viper deals +200% more damage on her next attack. Stacks up to 10 times additively.
When other Champions are attacked, Black Viper deals +100% more damage on her next attack. Stacks up to 5 times additively.

abilities.desc: When other Champions are attacked, Black Viper deals +100% more damage on her next attack. Stacks up to 5 times additively.

ult.description: Black Viper throws down a massive smokescreen, hindering enemies and helping herself.
ult.long_description: Black Viper creates a smokescreen, reducing damage done to the formation and causing all of her attacks to be Sneak Attacks.
ult.name: Smokescreen

base.description: Black Viper attacks a random enemy with her daggers.
base.name: En Garde

effects: Increases the damage of all Champions by 100%.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 20% for each Female Champion in the formation.

items.name: Leather Bracers
items.description: I've seen house servants better equipped for battle than this.

items.name: Fashionable Gauntlets
items.description: These work with my day to night outfit... if you know what I mean.

items.name: Spiked Gauntlets
items.description: 10 points if you can poke someone in the eye. Double if you can do it without laughing.

items.name: Master Thief's Gauntlets
items.description: ... they have pockets!

items.name: Decorative Rapier
items.description: This thing couldn't cut an apple!

items.name: Esvele's Rapier
items.description: Good for my fencing lessons, but not much else.

items.name: Balanced Rapier
items.description: A good sword should be balanced and move like an extension of yourself.

items.name: The Black Viper's Rapier
items.description: I still prefer my daggers, but sometimes you need something sharp to help keep a bit of distance.

items.name: Simple Mask
items.description: I had to glue it on & awkwardly explain the red marks on my face to nobles over tea.

items.name: Thief's Mask
items.description: I once stole the wrong signet ring because I couldn't see well enough through the eye holes.

items.name: Cheeky Mask
items.description: I had to smile constantly to get the mask to stick. I hated it.

items.name: The Black Viper's Mask
items.description: Its a pity to hide a face like mine, but if I must, then I will do so in style.

items.name: Kris Dagger
items.description: One of the first items I stole. Sentimental but not too sharp.

items.name: Kara-Tur Dagger
items.description: A gift from an aunt who lives near Kara-Tur. She always gives the best gifts.

items.name: Engraved Dagger
items.description: I had them specially made in Luskan. The black horn handles fit my palms perfectly.

items.name: The Viper's Fangs
items.description: Acquired with a friend after a long adventure. They hold poison in the handle.

items.name: Ragged Cloak
items.description: Well, at least no one will recognize me in this tattered thing.

items.name: Evening Wear
items.description: I vastly prefer this to the stuffy dresses and corsets I usually have to wear.

items.name: Stealth Cloak
items.description: You won't notice me there, behind you... you'll just notice your coinpurse is gone.

items.name: Viper's Cloak
items.description: I'm known for my talents, but I'll be remembered for my fashion sense.

items.name: False Gem
items.description: The first necklace I stole. I didn't realize it was a fake.

items.name: Sparkling Necklace
items.description: It's not as nice as the ones I own, but its disappearance will still stir up some fun.

items.name: Noble Jewels
items.description: They won't miss them. Trust me.

items.name: Ostentatious Display
items.description: I hate the nobility that requires these. . . baubles to show status.

data.backstory: Weighing in at just under 30 pounds and with a grandmotherly demeanor befitting her advanced age, Rosie Beestinger is easily mistaken for someone on the wrong side of the 'aggressor/victim' relationship. But this is a mix-up that few people make more than once.

abilities.name: Sassy

raw.tip_text: Rosie's damage is increased by having Champions in the formation who are younger than she is. Stack that formation!
raw.name: Sassy

description.desc: Increase the base damage of $target by $(not_buffed amount)% for each champion younger than her in the formation

abilities.desc: Rosie's damage is increased by having Champions in the formation who are younger than she is. Stack that formation!.

abilities.name: Deflect Missiles

raw.tip_text: Rosie can deflect ranged/magic attacks back at ranged attackers, as long as she's close to the Champion being attacked.
raw.name: Deflect Missiles

description.desc: Rosie deflects the ranged/magic attacks targeting her or adjacent champions every 2.5 seconds

abilities.desc: Rosie can deflect ranged/magic attacks back at ranged attackers, as long as she's close to the Champion being attacked.

abilities.name: Busy Beestinger

description.desc: Reduces the time between $(target)'s attacks by $(seconds_plural amount___2), and increases her damage by $(not_buffed amount)% for each "C" Team Champion in the formation

abilities.desc: Reduces the time between C, T, E, A and M's attacks by 0.5, and increases her damage by 400% for each "C" Team Champion in the formation.

abilities.name: Shadow Arts

conditions.desc: Every fourth attack, Rosie does a whirlwind hitting all nearby enemies for $amount% of her base damage
Every fifth attack, Rosie does a whirlwind hitting all nearby enemies for $amount% of her base damage

abilities.desc: Every fifth attack, Rosie does a whirlwind hitting all nearby enemies for 100% of her base damage.

abilities.name: Timeless Body
abilities.desc: Unknown.

ult.description: Rosie roots all enemies and darts around, striking up to 10, then deflects all missiles for a time.
ult.long_description: Rosie roots all enemies on the screen and darts around striking up to 10 for massive damage, then deflects all ranged and magic attacks for 15 seconds.
ult.name: Grammamancy

base.description: Rosie appears behind a random enemy and strikes them with her fists.
base.name: Shadow Step

effects: Increases the damage of all Champions by 10% for each Champion in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Female Champions by 125%.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 60% for each Halfing Champion in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Champions with a DEX score of 11 or higher by 100%.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 20% for each Champion with a CON score of 11 or higher in the formation.

items.name: Scratched Spyglass
items.description: If you put a drink at one end, it's easier to focus.

items.name: Case of lenses
items.description: One of these works, I swear! Not that one. Or that one.

items.name: AI Cartographer's Gear
items.description: Treat it right and it'll guide you to your goal - and your gold.

items.name: Rosie's Cartographer's Kit
items.description: You can map the land AND the stars with this one.

items.name: Crafty Necklace
items.description: A necklace crafted by my hand over many years.

items.name: Decorative Necklace
items.description: Each ball represents a single regret.

items.name: Necklace of the Greater Will
items.description: If you're lucky, your regrets can provide strength and empower your will.

items.name: Necklace of Grammamancy
items.description: Regret is only a reminder to act. Next time, laugh louder. Hit harder. Hug longer.

items.name: Flimsy Belt
items.description: It accentuates my figure.

items.name: Constellation Belt
items.description: It reminds me of the stars, even when the clouds are out.

items.name: Belt of the Beestinger
items.description: May it always guide your blows home.

items.name: Honeycombed Beestinger Belt
items.description: What's the exact opposite of a chastity belt?

items.name: Common Staff
items.description: It's not the worst staff I've ever seen.

items.name: Ringed Staff
items.description: Ringed for her pleasure. And their pain!

items.name: Beestinger Staff
items.description: Technically, Walnut found this for me. I should remember to thank her...

items.name: Ancient Staff of the Beestinger
items.description: If you sing to it just right, you may find an unlikely friend.

items.name: Dusty Jar
items.description: Do you have any eyeballs you can spare?

items.name: Half-empty Jar of Eyeballs
items.description: It was half-full, then I dropped one.

items.name: Stuffed Jar of Eyeballs
items.description: Oh, sure, now this collection is suddenly 'unnerving.'

items.name: Eyeballs of Legend
items.description: Break glass only in case of emergency. Seriously.

items.name: Smelly Pouch
items.description: Just a nice, empty bag. Nothing to clutter the mind.

items.name: Emerald Bag
items.description: Don't be absurd, dear. Do I look like I would collect 'protection payments?'

items.name: Overloaded Emerald Bag
items.description: Okay, seriously, no more emeralds.

items.name: Heirloom Bag
items.description: Fine. You know what? The Family thanks you for your generosity. Are you happy now?

data.backstory: Aila was found and raised by a clan of wild elves, but never truly felt like she belonged. The tartan that was found with her is the only clue she has to her lost elven roots. Aila is stubborn and proud. Whenever anyone questions her past, she simply states 'I'm a delight!'. However, her smirk holds a lifetime of anger & questions that she's held close to her heart.

abilities.name: Storm Aura

raw.tip_text: Aila periodically Primes enemies with her lightning aura, increasing the damage they take from all Champions.
raw.name: Storm Aura

description.desc: A random enemy approaching the formation is zapped by lightning and becomes Primed every $prime_time seconds. Primed enemies take 50% more damage from all Champions.

abilities.desc: Aila periodically Primes enemies with her lightning aura, increasing the damage they take from all Champions.

abilities.name: Heart of the Storm

description.desc: Increases the Health of all other Champions by $amount% of $source's Max Health

abilities.desc: Increases the Health of all other Champions by 25% of Aila's Max Health.

abilities.name: Storm Soul

raw.tip_text: Aila's attacks cause Primed enemies to become Electrified, further increasing the damage they take from all Champions.
raw.name: Storm Soul

description.desc: When Aila attacks a Primed enemy they are stunned for $stun_time seconds and become Electrified, increasing the damage they take from all Champions by 100% for each Electrified normal enemy on the screen, and 1000% for each Electrified boss on the screen. Stacks additively.

abilities.desc: Aila's attacks cause Primed enemies to become Electrified, further increasing the damage they take from all Champions.

abilities.name: Raging Storm

description.desc: Whenever Aila attacks an Electrified enemy, the Electrified state spreads to nearby enemies who are Primed, then all nearby enemies who are Electrified are stunned for $stun_time seconds.

abilities.desc: Whenever Aila attacks an Electrified enemy, the Electrified state spreads to nearby enemies who are Primed, then all nearby enemies who are Electrified are stunned for 0.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Shielding Storm

description.desc: When an Electrified enemy attacks Aila she gains a damage shield equal to 0.5% of her health times the total number of Aerois Synergy stacks. This effect has a 30 second cooldown.

abilities.desc: When an Electrified enemy attacks Aila she gains a damage shield equal to 0.5% of her health times the total number of Aerois Synergy stacks. This effect has a 30 second cooldown.

abilities.name: Aerois Synergy

description.desc: Aila contributes one stack to Aerois Synergy every time any Champion attacks an Electrified enemy. Their maximum number of stacks is 200 plus the highest area completed in the current run divided by 5 (rounded down). 50% of her contributed stacks are removed when changing areas. Electrified enemies take additional damage equal to 10% times the total number of Aerois Synergy stacks.

abilities.desc: Aila contributes one stack to Aerois Synergy every time any Champion attacks an Electrified enemy. Their maximum number of stacks is 200 plus the highest area completed in the current run divided by 5 (rounded down). 50% of her contributed stacks are removed when changing areas. Electrified enemies take additional damage equal to 10% times the total number of Aerois Synergy stacks.

ult.name: Storm Herald

base.description: Aila attacks the nearest enemy with her warhammer, the Howling Gale, knocking them back slightly.

items.name: Scraps of Fur
items.description: With my first kill, I learned to fend for myself.

items.name: Decorative Furs
items.description: Take what you can and leave nothing behind; it's the way of my people.

items.name: Hunting Furs
items.description: Poke it into a bush and it makes the perfect distraction.

items.name: Furs of the Stormbringer
items.description: Look upon the many trophies of my glorious hunts and tremble!

items.name: Snare Trap
items.description: Hunting was the first skill I learned in the lowlands.

items.name: Improved Snare Trap
items.description: From a child's toy to a tool for survival.

items.name: Catch Trap

data.backstory: Spurt the Kobold Inventor is crafty and quick with his hands. He builds improvised weapons in the hope of gaining some new advantage in combat. Spurt never knew he would have such lasting appeal when he met a mighty group of adventurers in a cave, but here we are. Packed to the gills with his 'awesome' inventions this clever kobold brings his 11-days of life experiences to the Champions, along with a really cool 'Centi-pult'!

raw.name: Heroic Sacrifice

description.desc: Unlocks Spurt's ultimate attack: You Dead! When Spurt uses his ultimate he becomes Spurt's Spirit until his ultimate is 10s from cooling down. While he's a Spirit, he increases the party's damage and buffs his other formation abilities in unique ways.

abilities.desc: Spurt's ultimate causes him to temporarily sacrifice himself, increasing the effects of his other abilities.

data.backstory: Qillek is timid, meek and nervous, being a comparably young character in the party and thrown into a world he doesn't understand with no wing to fly him out of a bad situation. His charisma, wit, and superiority ripped away when flying through the Valley of the Storms, taking his left wing and arm away but introducing him to H'esper, who gave him dark visions to push him forward. Inside him is an envious amount of courage and a stable sense of logic when things get dire, which has led other party members to consider him their leader. He doesn't agree with the idea, but he's not ready to let his friends down.

data.backstory: Raised as a gladiator in the pit arenas of Kara-Tur, Korth has since traveled the world studying fighting styles and the art of war. Korth is infamous for his skill and efficiency in battle - and for his ruthlessness, as he never spares the lives of his opponents. Those who cross Korth's path do so at their own risk.

data.backstory: Walnut is a child of the Enclave Panax Anima, an all-female clan of woodland defenders within the Kryptgarden Forest. Not only a frighteningly enthusiastic member of Acquisitions Incorporated, she also strives to protect the natural world by any means necessary. Did we mention she also has the goddess Mielikki living inside her? That seems important.

data.backstory: Shandie grew up on the rough streets of the Lower City of Baldur's Gate. She quickly learned that if she wanted to survive, she needed to be fast on her feet and even faster with her wit and weaponry. The first time Shandie saw a bowmaster gracefully launch an arrow into a bull's-eye, she knew she had to master archery. With years of practice under her belt, any opponents underestimating this stealthy halfling will soon realize how dangerous she is as a volley of arrows bear down on them unexpectedly from shadowy corners.

data.backstory: James Winifred Darkmagic III is the scion of a mysterious, multiplanar wizarding family. As an entertainer and purveyor of the 'Jim Darkmagic Experience,' the legendary mage can often be found in markets and town squares performing feats of mundane legerdemain. The renown he has earned for these feats is nearly equaled by the reputation that follows him as a Chief Arcanist (and occasional arsonist) for Acquisitions Incorporated.

abilities.name: Magic Magic Magic Magic

raw.tip_text: Jim increases the damage of all magical Champions (including himself) based on the number of magical Champions in the formation.
raw.name: Magic {magic}#CCC {magic}#888 {magic}#444

description.desc: Increase the damage of all Champions whose base attacks are magic by $(not_buffed amount)% for each such Champion in the formation.

description.desc: Every 5 attacks, $source uses their Wand of Wonder. It provides one of four random effects.$only_when_purchased The Wand can slow its target for 15 seconds, stun its target for 5 seconds, or transmogrify its target into an abyssal chicken with very little health or an armored mimic that drops more gold. Note: transmogrification can not affect boss or special creatures.

data.backstory: Wherever the aasimar known as Turiel goes, devils and demons know to tread lightly. Acting on orders of his divine patron, Bahamut, Turiel works tirelessly to bring law, order, and justice to Toril. When not busy with inquisitions or crusades, Turiel calls the endless libraries of Candlekeep his home, studying ancient tomes and seeking guidance for his next holy mission.

abilities.name: Embodiment of the Law

raw.tip_text: Turiel buffs Champions in the columns behind him, based on how far back they are.
raw.name: Embodiment of the Law

description.desc: Turiel increases the damage of all Champions by 100% for each column they are behind him, stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.desc: Turiel buffs Champions in the columns behind him, based on how far back they are.

abilities.name: Order's Demand

description.desc: When an enemy attempts to attack Turiel, they instead attack a different valid target, if one is available. When this occurs, Turiel increases the effect of Embodiment of the Law by $amount%, stacking multiplicatively up to 30 times and resetting stacks when changing areas.

data.backstory: Despite a reputation as a loud, gruff, and stinky dwarf who hates bathing, Thibbledorf Pwent is a loyal and beloved member of Clan Battlehammer. Known as 'Pwent' to his friends, he leads the Gutbusters of Mithral Hall, a dwarven battlerager squad focused on direct combat with little regard for their own safety. He wears armor completely covered in spikes to help rend the flesh of his enemies, and in the midst of battle Pwent often falls into a bloodrage, doing anything to protect his allies. While not an official member of the Companions of the Hall, Pwent will always aid his King when possible -- even beyond death...

abilities.name: Bleed

raw.tip_text: Enemies attacked by Pwent have a higher chance to being crit by any Champions
raw.name: Bleed

conditions.desc: When $source attacks he causes all enemies he damages to Bleed, taking $(amount) seconds worth of BUD damage every second for the next $(total_seconds) seconds. While an enemy is bleeding, attacks that target them have a $(pwent_bleed_crit_amount)% higher chance to critical hit (additively). If $source attacks an enemy that is already bleeding the duration is reset.

When $source attacks he causes all enemies he damages to Bleed, taking $(amount) seconds worth of BUD damage every second for the next $(total_seconds) seconds. While an enemy is bleeding, attacks that target them have a $(amount___2)% higher chance to critical hit (additively). If $source attacks an enemy that is already bleeding the duration is reset.

data.backstory: Avren is an embodiment of mischief; a trickster god in humanoid form. Long ago, he tricked an ancient being into giving him magic and immortality. This power also came with a curse: whenever Avren dies, he will return to life with a new body and varying abilities. While Avren's body may change, however, his soul and his undying love for his wife, Sofieus, always remains. The two have remained married for centuries, seeking each other out to reunite in each lifetime.

data.backstory: Sentry, protector of the Kingdom of Solwynn, is an ancient relic on her plane. Long ago, a dark power obliterated Sentry's peaceful home, forcing her to power down until a new purpose could wake her. Now, with her ceremonial axe, and memories of Solwynn guiding her, Sentry devotes herself to protecting the friends fighting alongside her. Despite being thrust into a new world eons beyond the one she knew, Sentry defends the good of the world from the dark reaches of evil's grasp. She will not fail again.

Guardian of Solwynn is increased by 10% times the total number of Aerois Synergy stacks.

data.backstory: Krull is a death-cleric of Tiamat who swore allegiance to Arkhan the Cruel after being bested by him in combat. He's Arkhan's alchemist, his experimenter, his torturer... Always surrounded by the dead, Krull wears a white painted face mask that makes him look undead in an effort to confuse and strike fear in his opponents.

abilities.name: Draconic Plague

raw.tip_text: Krull occasionally infects the next enemy to spawn with a Draconic Plague which can increase their damage taken, gold dropped, or make them trigger AOE damage.
raw.name: Draconic Plague

description.desc: Every 5 seconds, Krull applies a draconic plague to the next enemy to spawn. The plagues gain a stack every 3 seconds, increasing their power and capping at 10 stacks. Plagues can also be applied by Krull's base attack.^$plague_description

abilities.desc: Krull occasionally infects the next enemy to spawn with a Draconic Plague which can increase their damage taken, gold dropped, or make them trigger AOE damage.

abilities.name: Virulent Strain

description.desc: When an enemy with a Draconic Plague dies there is a $(amount)% chance that its plague(s) will transfer to another enemy. It's possible for an enemy to gain multiple copies of the same plague when this occurs, which will stack multiplicatively.

abilities.desc: When an enemy with a Draconic Plague dies there is a 10% chance that its plague(s) will transfer to another enemy. It's possible for an enemy to gain multiple copies of the same plague when this occurs, which will stack multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Arkhan's Army

raw.tip_text: Krull increases the damage of all evil Champions, but reduces the bonus for each good Champion in the formation.
raw.name: Arkhan's Army

description.desc: Krull increases the damage of all Evil Champions in the formation by $(amount)%, reduced by $(reduction)% for each Good Champion in the formation.

abilities.desc: Krull increases the damage of all evil Champions, but reduces the bonus for each good Champion in the formation.

abilities.name: The Master's Call

description.desc: Krull increases the damage of Arkhan the Cruel by $(amount)%, reduced by $(reduce_by_slot)% (multiplicatively) for each slot away from Krull greater than one.

abilities.desc: Krull increases the damage of Arkhan the Cruel by 400%, reduced by 75% (multiplicatively) for each slot away from Krull greater than one.

ult.description: Krull summons four corrupted ghouls that rush towards the nearest enemies and explode.
ult.long_description: Krull summons four corrupted ghouls that rush towards the nearest enemies and explode, damaging all nearby enemies and leaving behind pools of necrotic goo that last for 30 seconds.
ult.name: Corrupted Ghouls

Increases the damage of all Champions with a WIS score of 11 or higher by 100%.

items.name: Maul of the Speechless
items.description: Screams replaced by crippling fumes. Excellent.

items.description: Subject #466: Successful bone devil tail attachment. Subject stayed sane for 2 days.

items.name: Krull's Book of Secrets

items.description: You have such... interesting eyes.

items.name: Unnatural Spell Components
items.description: I said a FRESH tongue, this one is hours old!

items.name: Fae Components

items.name: Experimental Components
items.description: Have you ground up a unicorn horn? It rips at your soul in a way that... tickles me.

items.description: She empowers my master; the one known simply as: 'The Cruel'.

items.name: Tiamat Amulet

items.description: Do not underestimate the dragon queen's rage.

items.description: I knew I was bested when Arkhan's strikes started shearing off pieces of my shell.

items.name: Arkhan's Trophy
items.description: I reconstituted it, but it was painful.

items.name: Honored Symbology
items.description: If you don't know, I can't tell you.

items.name: Symbol of the Dark Order

items.name: The Weight of Servitude
items.description: It helps to keep a watchful eye on our subjects.

items.name: Hand Painted Symbol
items.description: With Arkhan, myself, and Torogar, the Dark Order is now complete.

data.backstory: Raised by the thieves' guild in Calimport, Artemis Entreri has since become one of the deadliest and most feared assassins in the history of Faerûn. Entreri is completely devoted to mastery of his craft, leaving no room in his life for emotional attachment or even personal pleasures. His fighting skills and tactical brilliance are equalled only by one other - the drow warrior Drizzt Do'Urden.

abilities.name: Observance

raw.tip_text: Artemis observes and duplicates a portion of formational abilities affecting other DPS Champions in the formation. You'll need a unique formation to take advantage of this.
raw.name: Observance

description.desc: Artemis observes and copies the positional formation abilities applied to other DPS Champions in the formation and gains a copy of those abilities on himself at $(amount)% of their effectiveness, even if he himself already receives that effect.

abilities.desc: Artemis observes and duplicates a portion of formational abilities affecting other DPS Champions in the formation. You'll need a unique formation to take advantage of this.

description.desc: Whenever Artemis kills an enemy, Artemis' damage is increased by $(not_buffed amount)% (multiplicatively). There is a $(chance)% chance per stack (additive) that Artemis' next attack deals $(extra)% more damage and resets the stack count.^$artemis_effect_description

Artemis' base attack cooldown also completes whenever another DPS Champion attacks.

data.backstory: The ranger Môrgæn is a renowned tracker and hunter, able to pinpoint-target foes at any range, then vanish into the woods with no one the wiser. Her legendary ability with the longbow and the custom arrows she crafts instills fear into the hearts of her many enemies -- and more than a few of her coworkers. Famously, she is the only member of Acquisitions Incorporated known to be paid in advance, lest a missed invoice lead to dire repercussions.

data.backstory: Havilar's twin sister Farideh has always been 'the smart one' and 'the responsible one'—but that's all right, Havilar is definitely 'the tough one,' 'the funny one' and the 'pretty one' (despite being identical twins). Plus, Havilar has a hellhound! Even if it means she's a sort-of-but-not-quite Chosen of Asmodeus, too, not that anyone asked Havi about that. But he should know her glaive is as good as her right hand, and she can slice a devil just as well as an orc, a zombie, or any other villain!

items.description: ...You know what, Zoonie? You can eat as many gnolls as you can catch. Get 'em!

items.name: Justice

items.description: Mehen says my glaive doesn't need a name, I need to watch my stance. DISAGREE!

items.name: Commoner's Dress

items.description: Hey, I worked for this. And it is WORKING for me!

items.description: 'You order, we act. That's the deal.'

items.name: Olla

items.name: Bosh

items.description: 'Lady, I'm mostly sure you're not supposed to be doing this!'

items.name: Glaive Decorations
items.description: The ribbon makes it slash faster--that does so make sense, Farideh!

items.name: Elegant Ribbon
items.description: If someone grabs me by the ribbon, worrywart, I'll chop their hands off.

items.name: Embroidered Ribbon
items.description: For your information, bossyboots, the pattern hides the dried monster brains.

items.name: Worn Chapbook
items.description: Brin and I have read this to each other about a hundred times.

items.name: The Giantess's Curse
items.description: Little did she know, the curse was true love. And also beholders.

items.name: The Secrets of the Obarskyrs
items.description: I love Brin, but his family is crazy. But also crazy entertaining.

items.name: The Lonely Widow
items.description: For best experience, get Brin to do the lonely widow's voice! Hilarious!

data.backstory: An outcast even from her home city of Omu on Chult, Sisaspia does not seek wealth or glory for herself. Instead, she wishes only to hone her powers, and anyone or anything that gets in her way will learn that she has already made great strides towards doing so. A reluctant ally, she joins the Champions solely because they are a means to an end: an endless stream of foes on which to unleash and perfect her sinister machinations.

abilities.name: Halo of Spores

raw.tip_text: Sisaspia infects enemies as they approach, causing them to take additional damage over time from each attack.
raw.name: Halo of Spores

conditions.desc: Sisaspia is surrounded by a torus of necrotic spores that cause enemies to take additional damage over time when attached to them.

Sisaspia is surrounded by a torus of necrotic spores. Every second, one of the spores shoots out and attaches itself to an enemy that is near the formation. When enemies are damaged, they take $amount% additional damage over 5 seconds for each spore affecting them. Normal enemies can only be affected by 1 spore, while bosses can be affected by 4 spores. Sisaspia regenerates a spore every 3 seconds and can have up to 30 spores in her reserve.^^$halo_of_spores_description

Sisaspia is surrounded by a torus of necrotic spores. Every second, one of the spores shoots out and attaches itself to an enemy that is near the formation. When enemies are damaged, they take $amount% additional damage over 5 seconds for each spore affecting them. Normal enemies can only be affected by 1 spore, while bosses can be affected by 4 spores. Sisaspia regenerates a spore every 4 seconds and can have up to 20 spores in her reserve.^^$halo_of_spores_description

abilities.desc: Sisaspia infects enemies as they approach, causing them to take additional damage over time from each attack.

abilities.name: Symbiotic Infection

raw.tip_text: Sisaspia uses the spores she has in reserve to buff nearby Champions.
raw.name: Symbiotic Infection

description.desc: Sisaspia uses her reserve of necrotic spores to empower a subtle infection she maintains upon her "companions", goading them forward and hopefully assisting her in her own selfish goals. This infection increases the damage of all Champions within 2 slots of herself by $amount% for each spore she has in reserve (additively).

abilities.desc: Sisaspia uses the spores she has in reserve to buff nearby Champions.

ult.description: Sisaspia causes all of her spores currently affecting her enemies to delve deep into their targets and tear them apart from the inside, dealing massive damage.
ult.long_description: Sisaspia causes all of her spores currently affecting her enemies to delve deep into their targets and tear them apart from the inside, dealing massive damage based on the total number of spores in play.
ult.name: Fungal Infestation

base.description: Sisaspia unleashes a wave of necrotic energy upon a random enemy. Deals additional damage to plants, but no damage to undead/constructs.
base.name: Blight

Increases the damage of all Champions by 285% for each Yuan-ti Champion in the formation.

items.name: Sinister Stick
items.description: Yes, Isn't it lovely? It's meant to distract you.

items.name: Snake-Headed Staff
items.description: How folks respond to my staff tells me if I'm safe to remove my cloak.

items.name: Solemn Staff
items.description: Drop the loot, count yourself lucky, and start running.

items.name: Serpent Scepter
items.description: Don't you love how the spores worship it?

items.name: Spare Spores
items.description: You can never have enough.

items.name: Spore Shaker
items.description: In case of emergency: throw.

items.name: Spore Garden
items.description: It would be in much better shape if we stopped walking all over the Sword Coast!

items.name: Fungal Syndicate
items.description: They each have a purpose.

items.name: Creeper Bulb
items.description: I've been studying the bulb's growth. It's terrifyingly fast. I love it!

items.name: Yellow-Musk Zombie Rabbit
items.description: I just call it Flopsy.

items.name: Zombie Grung
items.description: I can't tell you how many times it's gotten me out of trouble! Just let 'em loose!

items.name: Snake Ring

items.name: Tail Devouring Ring
items.description: Twisting it around has become a nervous tic. I must control it.

items.name: Ouroboros
items.description: One decision walks over the last. What decision led you to me?

items.name: World Serpents
items.description: Everything is cyclical.

items.name: Silent Stiletto
items.description: It's an excellent way to make my point.

items.name: Serrated Sabre
items.description: You never know what the jungles of Chult have to offer. Be prepared or be dead.

items.name: Scimitar of Dendar
items.description: The Night Serpent waits...

items.name: Sketch
items.description: You can only learn so much from bones.

items.name: Skeleton on Slate
items.description: I'm aware that it's good. But... thank you.

items.name: Spinach-Snacking Saur
items.description: The more you know of a foes habits, the easier it is to out-think them.

items.name: Stomper-Saur

data.backstory: Relentlessly brave but markedly uncouth, Briv Steelmarrow is a stalwart champion of the weak, innocent, downtrodden, and oppressed. Centuries ago, a cabal of Netherese mages experimented on Briv's clan, gifting him with a magical metal inside his bones that he can pull through his skin and shape for attack or defense. Once a bloodthirsty raider, Briv sought atonement by joining the Order of the Lost Cause, an elite group of knights that travel across Faerûn, taking on quests that only fools would pursue.

abilities.name: Steelbones

raw.tip_text: Briv stores power whenever he takes damage and uses it to buff the party and Sprint forward.
raw.name: Steelbones

description.desc: Whenever Briv comes under attack metal shoots out of his pores and covers him in strong armor. While armored, Briv takes $amount___2% less damage and gains stacks of Steelbones whenever he is hit by an enemy attack.

abilities.desc: Briv stores power whenever he takes damage and uses it to buff the party and Sprint forward.

abilities.name: Netherese Steel

effect_keys.override_key_desc: Increases the Damage of $target by $amount%

abilities.desc: Briv increases the damage of all Champions behind him by 0.01% for each stack of Steelbones he has gained.

abilities.name: Unnatural Haste

conditions.desc: Briv has a chance of sprinting forward quickly on steel-springs after completing a new area. This action consumes $stack_consume_percent% of his Sprint stacks, and requires at least $required_stacks stacks to occur. When you reset the adventure, all stacks of Steelbones that Briv has gained convert into stacks of Sprint. Unused Sprint stacks persist through resets.^$unnatural_haste_description

Briv sprints forward quickly on steel-springs after completing a new area, skipping the next $guaranteed_skip_amount areas entirely; Briv has a $skip_chance% chance to skip the next $skip_amount areas instead.  This action consumes $stack_consume_percent% of his Sprint stacks, and requires at least $required_stacks stacks to occur.^$unnatural_haste_description

Briv sprints forward quickly on steel-springs after completing a new area, skipping the next area entirely; Briv has a $skip_chance% to skip the next $skip_amount areas instead. This action consumes $stack_consume_percent% of his Sprint stacks, and requires at least $required_stacks stacks to occur.^$unnatural_haste_description

Briv has a $skip_chance% chance of sprinting forward quickly on steel-springs after completing a new area, skipping the next area entirely. This action consumes $stack_consume_percent% of his Sprint stacks, and requires at least $required_stacks stacks to occur.^$unnatural_haste_description

data.backstory: Born into the royal family of Celene, he assumed the simple name of Melf eschewing a life of comfort as a noble to study the arcane arts and train as a swordsman. He delved in the dungeons of Castle Greyhawk, the Lost Caverns of Tsojcanth and many other harrowing places honing his skills, knowledge and amassing powerful magical items. Melf sees himself as a weapon of weal hurtling toward the heart of the darkest evils in the realm. He is opinionated and has a touch of conceit that he is blissfully ignorant of possessing.

abilities.name: Melf's Adaptive Support Spell

description.desc: Increases the damage of Champions adjacent to Melf by $adaptive_support_base_value%. Effect increased by 50% if another elf is in the formation. Effect range increased by 2 if Melf is not in the front-most or rear-most columns. Effect increased by 25% for each unique race in the formation. ^$adaptive_support_description

abilities.desc: Increases the damage of Champions adjacent to Melf by 100%. Effect increased by 50% if another elf is in the formation. Effect range increased by 2 if Melf is not in the front-most or rear-most columns. Effect increased by 25% for each unique race in the formation.

abilities.name: Melf's Righteous Determination

description.desc: Melf knows exactly what evil is. Whenever an enemy spawns it has a 50% chance of being deemed "evil" by Melf. Enemies that are deemed evil take $amount% more damage from all Ultimate attacks.

abilities.desc: Melf knows exactly what evil is. Whenever an enemy spawns it has a 50% chance of being deemed "evil" by Melf. Enemies that are deemed evil take 400% more damage from all Ultimate attacks.

The buff provided changes after every 50th area and draws from these three possibilities:^- $(buffed_number 25)% chance to spawn additional enemies.^- Increased enemy spawn speed by $(buffed_number 25)%. ^- $(buffed_number 25)% chance of increased quest drops.^$speedy_suppliment_description

data.backstory: A scoundrel, a swashbuckler and a schemer, Krydle pretends he's not a hero, but somehow keeps finding himself on the side of light alongside his Baldur's Gate companions. Despite all his protests, Krydle is courageous when the chips are down and willing to sacrifice anything to save his newfound adventuring family.

raw.tip_text: Krydle increase the damage of champions in the two rearmost columns in the formation.
raw.name: From The Shadows

description.desc: Krydle begins every area with stacks of Evasion equal to his Overwhelm. When Krydle gets attacked, as long as he has at least $(stacks_to_trigger) stack of Evasion left, he dodges the attack completely and uses up $(stacks_to_use) stack of Evasion. Krydle restores $(stacks_to_restore) stacks of Evasion every second for each Healing Champion in the formation. Number of stacks can not surpass his Overwhelm. If a boss or enemies are enraged, max stacks are divided by the enrage multiplier, rounded down.

data.backstory: Jaheira is a noble-born half-elf who was raised by an enclave of druids after her family was killed. Having gained an understanding of balance, she resolved to serve nature with the skills the druids taught her. She was recruited by the Harpers, where she met her late husband, Khalid. Jaheira knows life isn't black and white. She lives in the balance, as nature demands.

data.backstory: Nova V'ger has a voracious appetite for knowledge; she needs to know anything and everything about anything and everything. Her magic powers have been gifted to her by a mysterious entity called Tiangong. She dreams of travelling to the stars and discovering the location of the true genasi homeworld.

abilities.name: Curiosity

raw.tip_text: Nova is intrinsically curious about the world around her. She increases the damage done to creatures the longer they are alive.
raw.name: Curiosity

description.desc: Nova is intrinsically curious about the creatures inhabiting the world. She inspects enemies as soon as they spawn, increasing their damage taken by $amount%. This increases by 10% (additively) every second they are alive, to a cap of 1000% (90 seconds). This ability is increased by 200% if Nova is in the front-most column of the formation.

abilities.desc: Nova is intrinsically curious about the world around her. She increases the damage done to creatures the longer they are alive.

abilities.name: The Crew

raw.tip_text: Nova increases the damage of all nearby Champions based on the sum of their levels.
raw.name: The Crew

description.desc: Nova increases the damage of Champions within two slots by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Champion level on the affected Champions, stacking multiplicatively. Each Champion's contribution caps at $(max_level_contribution_after_last_upgrade) levels after their last available upgrade.

abilities.desc: Nova increases the damage of all nearby Champions based on the sum of their levels.

abilities.name: Protective Field

description.desc: Nova increases the max health of all other Champions by 25% of her base max health.

abilities.desc: Nova increases the max health of all other Champions by 25% of her base max health.

abilities.name: Aerois Synergy

description.desc: Nova contributes one stack to Aerois Synergy every time an enemy is stunned, rooted, or slowed. Their maximum number of stacks is 200 plus the highest area completed in the current run divided by 5 (rounded down). 50% of her contributed stacks are removed when changing areas. The Crew is increased by 20% times the total number of Aerois Synergy stacks.

abilities.desc: Nova contributes one stack to Aerois Synergy every time an enemy is stunned, rooted, or slowed. Their maximum number of stacks is 200 plus the highest area completed in the current run divided by 5 (rounded down). 50% of her contributed stacks are removed when changing areas. The Crew is increased by 20% times the total number of Aerois Synergy stacks.

abilities.name: Slow

description.desc: Nova's attacks slow the movement of enemies she damages by 50% for 5 seconds. Enemies that are Slowed by this ability deal half damage to Nova. This effect does not stack if it is applied again before it expires, but the cooldown is refreshed.

abilities.desc: Nova's attacks slow the movement of enemies she damages by 50% for 5 seconds. Enemies that are Slowed by this ability deal half damage to Nova. This effect does not stack if it is applied again before it expires, but the cooldown is refreshed.

abilities.name: Failsafe

description.desc: When Nova becomes Overwhelmed, Tiangong creates a protective barrier around her and all other Champions in her column, granting them each 250% of Nova's max health as temporary HP. The effect of The Crew is increased by 400% for each Champion's shield that remains in place (stacking multiplicatively). Nova is stunned until the shield is broken or she is no longer overwhelmed. This can only trigger once per area. Changing areas resets it so it can happen again, but also resets the damage bonus and un-stuns Nova.

abilities.desc: When Nova becomes Overwhelmed, Tiangong creates a protective barrier around her and all other Champions in her column, granting them each 250% of Nova's max health as temporary HP. The effect of The Crew is increased by 400% for each Champion's shield that remains in place (stacking multiplicatively). Nova is stunned until the shield is broken or she is no longer overwhelmed. This can only trigger once per area. Changing areas resets it so it can happen again, but also resets the damage bonus and un-stuns Nova.

abilities.name: Discovery

This effect is buffed by $monster_heart_buff% for each monster heart she has collected (stacking additively and then applying multiplicatively), and $monster_brain_buff% for each monster brain she has collected (stacking multiplicatively and then applying multiplicatively).^Heroes of Aerois are automatically buffed by Discovery and are not included in the calculations for highest INT score.

Nova increases the damage of the $number_of_targets Champions in the formation with the highest Intelligence score by $amount%. ^^$nova_discovery

This effect is buffed by 0.1% for each monster heart she has collected (stacking additively and then applying multiplicatively), and 10% for each monster brain she has collected (stacking multiplicatively and then applying multiplicatively).

data.backstory: Freely has travelled across multiple Planes, but he has always has his luck to keep him safe. Even an unfortunate detour into being trapped as an Illithid ultimately led him into the company of his new friends! Armed with the magic in his blood, and the Faith that flows through his sword, he always seeks to destroy evil wherever he can sense it. Freely prefers to act first and think later, since hey, things always tend to work out for him anyway, right?

data.backstory: Beadle and Grimm have been best friends & adventuring partners their entire lives. Together, they have faced the most dangerous foes their realm had to offer and built a respite alongside the frozen north's harsh realities: The Giant's Bane Tavern.

description.desc: Increase the damage of Champions within 2 slots of Beadle by $(amount)%.

abilities.desc: Increase the damage of Champions within 2 slots of Beadle by 100%.

abilities.desc: Whenever Beadle damages an enemy that is not at full health, that enemy will drop 25% more gold when it is killed. Does not stack.

abilities.name: Long Rest

raw.tip_text: Beadle & Grimm get more powerful the longer they are inactive. Hold off using their ultimate for a while to get a big burst of power!

conditions.desc: Increase the effect of Beadle's Get Buff and Grimm's Special Order by $(amount)% per stack. The resting Champion's buff increases by 1 stack every 10 seconds while the active Champion's stacks reduce by 1 every 10 seconds. When the active champion is swapped for the other, their stacks are reset.^^$beadle_grimm_long_rest

Increase the effect of Beadle's Get Buff by $(amount)% per stack. While Beadle is active, Grimm's buff increases by 1 stack every 10 seconds and Beadle's stacks reduce by 1 every 10 seconds. Beadle's stacks reset when swapped with Grimm.^^$beadle_grimm_long_rest

abilities.desc: Beadle & Grimm get more powerful the longer they are inactive. Hold off using their ultimate for a while to get a big burst of power!.

data.backstory: Omin Dran built the organization called Acquisitions Incorporated to facilitate his quest to find his true sister, at least in part. Despite his unprecedented success in establishing the market for franchised adventuring across the Sword Coast and beyond, Omin's full measure eludes most people. He is known to be a worshiper of Tymora, ruthless in matters of business, feckless in matters of love, and hopeless in games of chance. He is often accused of being a Masked Lord of Waterdeep, though that would explain some things...

data.backstory: Born in The Cogs beneath Sharn's Lower City, Lazaapz's remarkable intellect elevated her to the Tradefair district, where her mechanical genius became highly sought after by the Dragonmarked Houses. Lazaapz's first invention was a functional mechanical arm to replace the one she was born without; now she leads an elite team of engineers in cutting edge research and development. Following the discovery of a mysterious Eldritch Machine, Lazaapz was brought in by House Cannith to ascertain the purpose of the device. Shortly after, both Lazaapz and the machine disappeared, never to be seen again.

data.backstory: Dragonbait is a champion of good and a saurial — a race that originated on a distant world and whose members have long lives. Very few saurials dwell in the Forgotten Realms, and no saurial communities are believed to exist anywhere in the world. The saurial's language is a combination of clicks and whistles beyond the human range of hearing, so Dragonbait relies on 'shouting' scents to communicate emotions. Dragonbait's known scents include: brimstone (confusion), roses (sadness), lemon (pleasure or joy), baked bread (anger), violets (danger or fear), honeysuckle (tenderness or concern), wood smoke (devotion or piety), tar (victory or celebration), and ham (nervousness or worry).

data.backstory: Ulkoria has defended Waterdeep with her magic more times than she can recall. She is a well-respected member of the Watchful Order, often working closely with The Blackstaff on the city's defense. Known only as 'the Gargoyle' by most, her face often locks into a scowl of concentration. Few have withstood her withering stares without relenting.

abilities.desc:
Ulkoria provides additional buffs based on the number of Spellcaster School stacks she has.  
> 3+ stacks: Attack speeds of Champions counting towards Spellcaster School are reduced by 300 sec.  
> 5+ stacks: Increase the positional formation ability effects of Champions counting towards Spellcaster School by 300% for each stack.  
> 7+ stacks: Each time a Champion counting towards Spellcaster School attacks there is a 50% chance that their base attack cooldown will immediately reset.  
> 9+ stacks: Increase the base value of Spellcaster School by 200%.

data.backstory: There's savage, and then there's Torogar. Few had even survived a head-to-head match with him before he ran into Arkhan the Cruel. He was known worlds over as an unstoppable brute. Now, as a part of the Dark Order, Torogar leads armies and communes with a god, but he's always down for another one-on-one match.

data.backstory: Ezmerelda d'Avenir, a Vistana monster hunter, has devoted herself to ridding the world of evil in all of its forms. After years of tutelage by her mentor, the vampire hunter Rudolph van Richten, Ezmerelda struck out on her own. She has since amassed a sizable personal fortune and an impressive arsenal of weapons for hunting monsters. Following the defeat of Strahd von Zarovich, Ezmerelda joins the Champions on their journeys through the world of Toril.

data.backstory: Penelope 'Half-Pint' is a halfling who just wants to be everyone's best friend, even if they are evil, or a plant, or a rock. With friends that already include a treant named Neverember, and a clan of chwinga that have adopted her, Penelope is ready for anything! She has the heart of a true hero and will always stand by her friends, until she goes into shrub mode of course.

abilities.name: Have You Met My Friends

raw.tip_text: Penelope causes enemies she hits but doesn't kill to take additional damage from other Champions.
raw.name: Have You Met My Friends

description.desc: Whenever $target attacks an enemy and doesn't kill it, for the next 30 seconds all Champions deal $amount% more damage against them.

abilities.desc: Penelope causes enemies she hits but doesn't kill to take additional damage from other Champions.

abilities.name: Chwinga Mask

raw.tip_text: When the formation comes under attack Penelope buffs the formation based on those Champions around her.
raw.name: Chwinga Mask

description.pre: Whenever the formation is under attack, Penelope dons her chwinga mask, calling an elemental friend to her aid. It sits on her shoulder while her mask is on. All Champions adjacent to Penelope gain the following charm(s) based on their tags. Charms last as long as the formation is under attack and then for 10 seconds afterwards.

conditions.desc: ^Healing Charm: Penelope heals adjacent Tank Champions $amount___2 HP every second^$chwinga_mask_healing_charm_stacks^Tools for the Job Charm: Penelope increases the damage of all Champions by $(not_buffed amount___3)% for each adjacent Healing, Support, or Gold Find Champion^$chwinga_mask_tools_charm_stacks

abilities.desc: When the formation comes under attack Penelope buffs the formation based on those Champions around her.

abilities.name: Story Time

effect_keys.override_key_desc_old: Each stack increases the Damage of $target by $amount%, stacks every time a Champion within 2 slots to $source kills an Enemy (stacks decrease by half rounded up on area change)

description.desc: Each time a Champion within 2 slots of Penelope kills an enemy, add a stack of Story Time. Story Time stacks are capped at 40. The stacks of Story Time affect both charms given by Chwinga Mask. Every time you change areas, reduce the stacks of Story Time by half, rounded down.

abilities.desc: Each time a Champion within 2 slots of Penelope kills an enemy, add a stack of Story Time. Story Time stacks are capped at 40. The stacks of Story Time affect both charms given by Chwinga Mask. Every time you change areas, reduce the stacks of Story Time by half, rounded down.

ult.description: A fountain of churned earth and stone erupt under the nearest enemy, dealing AOE damage in a large radius and creating difficult terrain that lasts for 30 seconds.
ult.long_description: A fountain of churned earth and stone erupt under the nearest enemy, dealing AOE damage in a large radius and creating difficult terrain that slows enemies in it by 50% and lasts for 30 seconds.
ult.name: Erupting Earth

data.backstory: Lucius Virion-Elluin Elenasto was born to high nobility. He thought he knew what he was getting into when he joined the Heroes of Aerois, but then he met his first cow. Dreadful, evil creatures. Lucius is slowly coming out of his nobility shell as he continues to learn the true value of comradery, friendship, and a world without barriers.

abilities.name: Arcane Chromat - Acid

raw.tip_text: Lucius deals extra damage to enemies the more times he attacks them.
raw.name: Arcane Chromat - Acid

description.desc: Enemies damaged by Acid Splash gain one stack of Acid. Each enemy can have up to $(acid_max_stacks) stacks of Acid. Acid stacks last until the enemy is defeated. Enemies affected by Acid take $(acid_base_amount)% more damage per stack (stacking multiplicatively) from $(source_hero)' subsequent Acid attacks. Armored enemies affected by at least one stack of Acid lose twice as many armored hit points when $(source_hero) damages them with Acid attacks.

abilities.desc: Lucius deals extra damage to enemies the more times he attacks them.

abilities.name: Arcane Chromat - Cold

raw.tip_text: Lucius deals extra damage to slowed, stunned, and rooted enemies.
raw.name: Arcane Chromat - Cold

description.desc: Enemies damaged by Ray of Frost are slowed by $(cold_slow_amount)% for $(debuff_duration) seconds and take $(cold_base_amount)% more damage from Ray of Frost for each slow, stun, or root affecting them (stacking multiplicatively), including the initial slow. If an enemy is affected by Ray of Frost again before the slow/debuff expires, the cooldown is renewed.

abilities.desc: Lucius deals extra damage to slowed, stunned, and rooted enemies.

abilities.name: Elemental Adept

description.desc: When an enemy is affected by both Arcane Chromat abilities they are stunned and frozen in place for $(lucius_elemental_adept_timer) seconds. After, they "explode", applying one stack of Arcane Chromat - Acid and dealing Acid damage to themselves and all nearby enemies. This removes the Arcane Chromat - Cold debuff on the enemy. The explosion damage is equal to $(amount)% of $(source_hero)' normal attack damage times the total Aerois Synergy stacks.

abilities.desc: When an enemy is affected by both Arcane Chromat abilities they are stunned and frozen in place for  seconds. After, they "explode", applying one stack of Arcane Chromat - Acid and dealing Acid damage to themselves and all nearby enemies. This removes the Arcane Chromat - Cold debuff on the enemy. The explosion damage is equal to 10% of Lucius' normal attack damage times the total Aerois Synergy stacks.

abilities.name: Aerois Synergy

description.desc: $(source_hero) contributes $(base_stacks___2) stack to Aerois Synergy every time Elemental Adept is triggered; bosses contribute an additional $(bonus_boss_stacks___2) stacks. Their maximum number of stacks is $(base_max_stacks___2) plus the highest area completed in the current run divided by 5. $(percent_of_stacks_to_remove_on_area_change___2)% of his contributed stacks are removed when changing areas. $(source_hero)' damage is increased by $(not_buffed amount)% times the total number of Aerois Synergy stacks.

abilities.desc: Lucius contributes 2 stack to Aerois Synergy every time Elemental Adept is triggered; bosses contribute an additional 8 stacks. Their maximum number of stacks is 200 plus the highest area completed in the current run divided by 5. 50% of his contributed stacks are removed when changing areas. Lucius' damage is increased by 50% times the total number of Aerois Synergy stacks.

abilities.name: Elemental Adept

description.pre: When an enemy is affected by both of Lucius' Arcane Chromat abilities they are stunned and frozen in place for 3 seconds then "explode" with acid, taking $(lucius_elemental_adept_explosion_damage) damage (1/5th of Elemental Adept stacks seconds worth of Acid Chromat tick damage). This also consumes both the Arcane Chromat debuffs on the enemy, and spreads the Acid DoT to nearby enemies.^^Each explosion increases Elemental Adept's stacks by 1.

conditions.desc: ^Stacks cap at $(lucius_elemental_adept_max_stacks) and reset by $(lingering_chill_amount)% when changing areas.^Elemental Adept Stacks: $(lucius_elemental_adept_stacks)
^Stacks cap at $(lucius_elemental_adept_max_stacks) and reset to 0 when changing areas.^Elemental Adept Stacks: $(lucius_elemental_adept_stacks)

abilities.desc:
When an enemy is affected by both of Lucius' Arcane Chromat abilities they are stunned and frozen in place for 3 seconds then "explode" with acid, taking 3000 damage (1/5th of Elemental Adept stacks seconds worth of Acid Chromat tick damage). This also consumes both the Arcane Chromat debuffs on the enemy, and spreads the Acid DoT to nearby enemies.  
>   
> Each explosion increases Elemental Adept's stacks by 1.

specs.name: Dichromancy

raw.name: Dichromancy
raw.specialization_description: Lucius focuses on increasing the damage dealt by the combination of his two elements.

description.desc: Increase the "explode" damage of $(upgrade_name id) by $(amount)%.

specs.desc: Increase the "explode" damage of Elemental Adept by 200%.

specs.name: Elemental Master

raw.name: Elemental Master
raw.specialization_description: Lucius specializes in working with his allies to increase his damage.

description.desc: Increase the effect of $(upgrade_name id) on $(source_hero)' damage by $(amount)%.

specs.desc: Increase the effect of Aerois Synergy on Lucius' damage by 100%.

specs.name: Lingering Chill

raw.name: Lingering Chill
raw.specialization_description: Lucius' enemies remain minorly slowed even after he has triggered his combo.

description.desc: When an enemy explodes and loses their Arcane Chromat - Cold debuff, they gain a Lingering Chill debuff which slows them by $(cold_slow_amount)% and lasts for $(debuff_duration) seconds. If this debuff applies again before it expires, the cooldown is refreshed. Stacks with Arcane Chromat - Cold.

specs.desc: When an enemy explodes and loses their Arcane Chromat - Cold debuff, they gain a Lingering Chill debuff which slows them by 25% and lasts for 20 seconds. If this debuff applies again before it expires, the cooldown is refreshed. Stacks with Arcane Chromat - Cold.

ult.description: Lucius attacks with a cone of prismatic energy dealing damage and applying both Arcane Chromat debuffs.
ult.long_description: Eight multicoloured rays flash from Lucius' hand in a cone shape. Each enemy in the cone takes damage and receives both the Arcane Chromat - Acid and Arcane Chromat - Cold.
ult.name: Prismatic Spray

base.description: Lucius attacks a random enemy with Acid Splash, dealing damage. Prefers enemies not affected by acid.
base.name: Acid Splash
