items.description: It houses an airship power source. Daddy entrusted it to my care.

data.backstory: Baeloth Barrityl is the master of The Black Pits, the combat arena he claims is 'the best show in all the realms'. Baeloth captures hapless adventurers to fight to the death all for the sake of entertainment! When he's not commanding the attention of anyone near him, he's doing whatever he can to reinforce that he's one of the top five spellcasters in all the realms.

abilities.name: Paid Partially with Pain

description.desc: Enemies hit by Baeloth's Chain Lightning drop $amount% more gold when killed.

abilities.desc: Enemies hit by Baeloth's Chain Lightning drop 25% more gold when killed.

abilities.name: Cause For Celebration

raw.tip_text: Champions immediately in front or behind Baeloth kill enemies in an explosion of confetti that can damage nearby enemies.
raw.name: Cause For Celebration

effect_keys.override_key_desc: Whenever $target kills an enemy Baeloth's Cause for Celebration is triggered

description.desc: Enemies killed by Champions in the column ahead of or behind Baeloth explode into magical paper confetti, dealing damage and slowing enemies near them by 50% for 10 seconds. The damage done ignores debuffs and is either half of the hit that killed them or one quarter of their max health, whichever is higher. This effect can chain if the explosion kills an enemy.

abilities.desc: Champions immediately in front or behind Baeloth kill enemies in an explosion of confetti that can damage nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Morbid Excitement

effect_keys.override_key_desc: Increase the damage of $target by $amount%

conditions.desc: All Champions in the column in front or behind Baeloth do $amount___2% more damage per Morbid Excitement stack. Morbid Excitement loses 10% of stacks every 10 seconds and stacks cap at $max_stacks___2.^Stacks are earned for the following:^- A favored foe is defeated: +1 Stack^- An enemy drops more gold due to Paid Partially with Pain: +1 Stack^- An enemy explodes in confetti due to Cause for Celebration: +4 Stacks^- A chain reaction kills an enemy due to Cause for Celebration: +6 Stacks^- A Champion in any column in front of Baeloth takes damage: +5 Stacks^- A Champion dies: +100 Stacks

All Champions in the column in front or behind Baeloth do $amount___2% more damage per Morbid Excitement stack. Morbid Excitement loses 10% of stacks every 10 seconds and stacks cap at $max_stacks___2.^Stacks are earned for the following:^- A favored foe is defeated: +1 Stack^- An enemy drops more gold due to Paid Partially with Pain: +1 Stack^- An enemy explodes in confetti due to Cause for Celebration: +2 Stacks^- A chain reaction kills an enemy due to Cause for Celebration: +3 Stacks^- A Champion in any column in front of Baeloth takes damage: +5 Stacks^- A Champion dies: +100 Stacks

abilities.desc:
All Champions in the column in front or behind Baeloth do 10% more damage per Morbid Excitement stack. Morbid Excitement loses 10% of stacks every 10 seconds and stacks cap at 20.  
> Stacks are earned for the following:  
> - A favored foe is defeated: +1 Stack  
> - An enemy drops more gold due to Paid Partially with Pain: +1 Stack  
> - An enemy explodes in confetti due to Cause for Celebration: +2 Stacks  
> - A chain reaction kills an enemy due to Cause for Celebration: +3 Stacks  
> - A Champion in any column in front of Baeloth takes damage: +5 Stacks  
> - A Champion dies: +100 Stacks.

abilities.name: Generous Djinn

raw.tip_text: Champions revived by Najim provide a large buff which lasts until they are killed again.
raw.name: Generous Djinn

conditions.desc: Baeloth's Djinn servant, Najim, will bring any Champion that dies back to life at 1HP and make them immune to all damage for 30 seconds. For as long as the resurrected Champion lives, the party's damage is increased by $amount%. This ability has a 60 second cooldown.

Baeloth's Djinn servant, Najim, will bring any Champion that dies back to life at 1HP and make them immune to all damage for 20 seconds. For as long as the resurrected Champion lives, the party's damage is increased by $amount%. This ability has a 60 second cooldown.

abilities.desc: Champions revived by Najim provide a large buff which lasts until they are killed again.

ult.description: Najim streaks across the field, damaging all enemies, pushing survivors back slightly, and setting Baeloth's excitement stacks to max.
ult.long_description: Najim streaks across the field, dealing massive damage to all enemies, pushing ones that survive back slightly, but more importantly increasing Baeloth's excitement stacks to max.
ult.name: Now That's An Entrance

base.description: Baeloth fires a bolt of lightning at a random enemy, which deals damage and arcs up to 4 times dealing, 20% less damage per arc.
base.long_description: Baeloth fires a bolt of lightning at a random enemy, which deals damage and arcs up to 4 times dealing, 20% less damage per arc.
base.name: Chain Lightning

items.name: Combatant Covering
items.description: I hope you're satisfied. Look at my ragged raiment!

items.name: Everyday Armor
items.description: We do wonderful work! I'm impressed.

items.name: Pristine Provisions
items.description: Perhaps you can deal with those persistent pixies. I have a speech to prepare!

items.name: Sorcerer's Ceremonial Covering
items.description: Always look your best. You never know when you're going to meet a god.

items.name: Basic Hooded Robes
items.description: I do enjoy messing with lesser spellcasters.

items.name: Spellcaster Robes
items.description: Ulkoria, perhaps it's time for the adept to become the apprentice.

items.name: Evil Robes of the Archmagi
items.description: Fight or flee, either way, you fall!

items.name: Grand Entertainer's Robes
items.description: Let me entertain you!

items.name: Carved Staff
items.description: Death delivered! In handy hand-held form!

items.name: Skull Staff
items.description: I will join you. So that you can feel safe.

items.name: Staff of Striking
items.description: The skull sparkles when I smack someone's scalp. How scintillating!

items.name: Staff of the Dungeon Director
items.description: You wouldn't be interested in playing a little game, would you?

items.name: Threadbare Rug
items.description: Honestly, I'm huge in the Underdark.

items.name: Hidden Carpet
items.description: No one looks down when you command the crowd!

items.name: Carpet of Flying
items.description: Yes, yes. It flies. It also has a temper. Watch out.

items.name: Standard Entrance Supplies
items.description: Fireworks, flaying, a flying carpet, and me. It's like my birthday all over again!

items.name: Painted Placard
items.description: Are you ready to spill blood in the arena?

items.name: Average Advertisement
items.description: Well, it's a pit, and the sun is setting. Quiet down, doubters, it'll do.

items.name: Printed Paraphernalia
items.description: Franchise opportunities available.

items.name: Black Pits Banner
items.description: Witness the brilliant and bizarre battles in the Black Pits!

items.name: Accursed Ring
items.description: It looks great, but... yes. It does look great, doesn't it. What were we talking about?

items.name: Ring of Djinni Summoning
items.description: Najim shall ensure that we are rewarded appropriately.

items.name: Barrityl's Burden
items.description: Regrettably, the ring's removal is not a resource I retain.

items.name: The Entertainer's Ring
items.description: Najim? Are you even LISTENING?

data.backstory: Talin Uran is a rogue of great renown within Waterdeep. While on an assignment with the Grambar's Blades a few years ago, he was caught in a building collapse which left him paralysed from the waist down. Now equipped with his combat wheelchair, Talin is back to doing what he does best: Saving the day and looking awesome doing it.

abilities.name: Scatter Tacks

raw.tip_text: Talin scatters tacks behind him after attacking, slowing enemies that walk in that area.
raw.name: Scatter Tacks

conditions.desc: When Talin attacks with Quiet Ambush he leaves behind a set of Scatter Tacks which cause enemies standing on them to be slowed by 75% and take $(amount)% more damage from attacks.
When Talin attacks with Quiet Ambush he leaves behind a set of Scatter Tacks which cause enemies standing on them to be slowed by 50% and take $(amount)% more damage from attacks.

abilities.desc: Talin scatters tacks behind him after attacking, slowing enemies that walk in that area.

abilities.name: Spot Weakness

raw.tip_text: Talin observes weaknesses of enemies and whispers them to nearby Champions increasing their damage.
raw.name: Spot Weakness

description.pre: Talin increases the damage of all Champions by $(amount)%. This ability is increased by $(amount_per_stack)% for each enemy killed in the current area, stacking multiplicatively and capping at $(talin_weakness_max_stacks) kills. The effect is reduced by $(reduction_per_slot)% for each slot past one a given Champion is away from Talin(stacking multiplicatively).

conditions.desc: ^^Current Stacks: $(talin_weakness_current_stacks)^Damage Bonus Amount: $(talin_weakness_total_bonus)%

abilities.desc: Talin observes weaknesses of enemies and whispers them to nearby Champions increasing their damage.

abilities.name: Antagonist

effect_keys.override_key_desc: Increases the Damage of $target by $amount%

conditions.desc: Talin decreases the DPS of Good Champions in the formation by $(not_buffed amount___2)%, but increases the damage of Evil Champions by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Good Champion, stacking multiplicatively.

Talin decreases the DPS of Evil Champions in the formation by $(not_buffed amount___2)%, but increases the damage of Good Champions by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Evil Champion, stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.desc: Talin decreases the DPS of Evil Champions in the formation by 50%, but increases the damage of Good Champions by 50% for each Evil Champion, stacking multiplicatively.

ult.description: Talin throws a hoop blade in a large looping arc, damaging all enemies it encounters before returning to Talin.
ult.long_description: Talin detaches a secondary hoop-shaped blade from his wheelchair's rear wheel and flings it at the farthest enemy. It travels in a large looping arc, damaging all enemies it encounters before returning to Talin.
ult.name: Razor Edged Chakram

base.description: Talin disappears into the shadows and stabs a random enemy with his rapier.
base.long_description: Talin disappears into the shadows and reappears behind a random enemy, stabbing them with his rapier. He then shadowsteps back into the formation.
base.name: Quiet Ambush

items.description: There's a lot of history tied to that weld on the blade.

items.name: Tenacious Blade
items.description: We don't back down.

items.name: Spider Badge
items.description: You'd be surprised how often this gets me out of jams!

items.name: Bregan D'aerthe Badge
items.description: Don't tell Jarlaxle.

items.name: Grambar's Blades Brooch
items.description: Keep this in your pocket while in the Dock Ward. Tell 'em Talin Uran sent you.

items.name: Champion's Badge
items.description: Nat made it after my latest argument with Jarlaxle. I have no idea where she got the feather...

items.name: Hanging Lantern
items.description: If you twist the pole in a counter-clockwise motion, the light extinguishes.

items.name: Lit Lamp
items.description: It's a bit more subtle than the time Ezmerelda cast light on my whole wheelchair.

items.name: Ornate Lamp
items.description: A gift from Ulkoria, an old friend from Waterdeep.

items.name: Prismatic Lamp
items.description: The Champions don't give up. Never forget that.

items.name: Caltrops
items.description: I upgraded my tires, don't worry.

items.name: Parting Gifts
items.description: They don't look so fast NOW do they?

items.name: Scatter Tacks
items.description: Did you think this was my first adventure?

items.name: Smokepowder Tacks
items.description: Baeloth makes his big entrance, and I'm on our exit distraction, got it.

items.name: Well-Worn Gloves
items.description: That muck? Won't be a problem.

items.name: Fingerless Grips
items.description: No friction burns, and I can still pick a lock with finesse!

items.name: Combat Wheelchair Gloves
items.description: I had them commissioned after my last trip into Undermountain. Yuck.

items.name: Ornate Gloves of Speed
items.description: Watch me now!

items.name: Sharp Rims
items.description: You should have seen them after Avernus!

items.name: Hoop-Shaped Blades
items.description: They attach to the outside of my push rims and detach with a quick wrist flick.

items.name: Razor Edges
items.description: I said we can never have enough targets, but I might have been mistaken. DUCK!

items.name: Slicer and Dicer
items.description: Only for special occasions.

data.backstory: Zrang, his twin brother Kleeb, and their brood-sister Yassa began their Icewind Dale existence stealing gems and dreaming of being respected by the locals. Inspired by their mentor, Jarlaxle, they stand tall to form Hew Maan - who is totally a human and not on a nefarious mission to steal all the Champions' stuff.

abilities.name: Teamwork

raw.tip_text: Hew Maan provides different buffs depending on their proximity to the front of the formation.
raw.name: Teamwork

description.pre: Depending on where they are placed in the formation, a different kobold takes the top slot in the trench coat and provides a different buff:^{Zrang}#955d81 $(hewmaan_zrang_inactive)- $(hewmaan_front_x_columns) - Enemies have a $(amount___2)% chance to drop double quest items or count for double quest progress.^{Kleeb}#992920 $(hewmaan_kleeb_inactive)- $(hewmaan_middle_x_columns) - Increases the damage of Champions against boss enemies by $(amount___3)%. If the boss has hits-based or armor-based health, successful attacks destroy twice as many segments as they normally would.^{Yassa}#d39322 $(hewmaan_yassa_inactive)- $(hewmaan_back_x_columns) - Increases the damage of Champions within two columns of Hew Maan by $(amount___4)%

conditions.desc: ^^Current Top Kobold: $(hewmaan_teamwork_top_kobold)

abilities.desc: Hew Maan provides different buffs depending on their proximity to the front of the formation.

abilities.name: Hello, Fellow Humans

raw.tip_text: Hew Maan buffs their abilities based on the number of "other" humans in the formation.
raw.name: Hello, Fellow Humans

conditions.desc: Increases the effect of {Kleeb}#992920 and {Yassa's}#d39322 Teamwork abilities based on the number of Champions of the most populous race in the formation:^1-3 others: +100%^4-5 others: +700%^6-7 others: +3100%^8+ others: +12700%

Increases the effect of {Kleeb}#992920 and {Yassa's}#d39322 Teamwork abilities based on the number of other lawful Champions in the formation:^1-3 others: +100%^4-5 others: +700%^6-7 others: +3100%^8+ others: +12700%

Increases the effect of {Kleeb}#992920 and {Yassa's}#d39322 Teamwork abilities based on the number of other unaffiliated Champions in the formation:^1-3 others: +100%^4-5 others: +700%^6-7 others: +3100%^8+ others: +12700%

Increases the effect of {Kleeb}#992920 and {Yassa's}#d39322 Teamwork abilities based on the number of human Champions in the formation:^1-3 others: +100%^4-5 others: +700%^6-7 others: +3100%^8+ others: +12700%

abilities.desc: Hew Maan buffs their abilities based on the number of "other" humans in the formation.

abilities.name: Carefully Balanced

description.desc: Increases the effect of {Zrang's}#955d81 Teamwork ability by $(amount)% for each Champion adjacent to the kobolds (stacks additively and then applied to Teamwork multiplicatively).

abilities.desc: Increases the effect of {Zrang's}#955d81 Teamwork ability by 5% for each Champion adjacent to the kobolds (stacks additively and then applied to Teamwork multiplicatively).

abilities.name: Impressive Coatwork

description.desc: The effect of all Teamwork abilities are increased by $(amount)%

abilities.desc: The effect of all Teamwork abilities are increased by 100%.

abilities.name: Please Stand By

description.desc: The two kobolds that are not on top provide lesser buffs passively. These abilities are not buffed by Hello, Fellow Humans.^{Zrang}#955d81 $(hewmaan_please_stand_by_zrang_inactive)- Boss enemies move $(amount___2)% slower^{Kleeb}#992920 $(hewmaan_please_stand_by_kleeb_inactive)- Hits-based enemies have a 50% chance of spawning with $(amount___3)% of their hits already gone (rounded down)^{Yassa}#d39322 $(hewmaan_please_stand_by_yassa_inactive)- Reduces the base attack cooldown of Champions adjacent to the kobolds by $(amount___4)s

abilities.desc:
The two kobolds that are not on top provide lesser buffs passively. These abilities are not buffed by Hello, Fellow Humans.  
> {Zrang}#955d81 - Boss enemies move 25% slower  
> {Kleeb}#992920 - Hits-based enemies have a 50% chance of spawning with 25% of their hits already gone (rounded down)  
> {Yassa}#d39322 - Reduces the base attack cooldown of Champions adjacent to the kobolds by 0.5s.

items.name: Adventurer's Cloak
items.description: More kobolds is more better! ~Yassa

items.name: Basic Sling
items.description: See that knot right here? I tied that. ~Yassa

items.description: The sling was invented by a kobold. You didn't know that? ~Kleeb

items.description: Ishi helped me tighten the string. Now it shoots! ~Yassa

items.name: Hew Maan's Walking Sticks
items.description: More crossbows is more better! ~Kleeb

items.name: Naming Thing
items.description: You need to use our Champion name! ~Zrang

items.description: Penelope is our friend too! ~Kleeb, Yassa, and Zrang

items.description: More rocks is more better! ~Zrang

items.name: Ten-Towns Memory

items.name: Lullaby Doll
items.description: Eyes out for the walker. Run away - from its light. No, really. RUN!~Yassa

items.description: We're so heroic! ~Yassa

items.name: Kleeb's Arrow
items.description: Yassa said I needed to start a hobby ~Kleeb

items.description: If Deekin gets wings, Hew Maan wants wings! ~Kleeb

data.backstory: A glamorous diva possessed by a Deva, with an inciting voice and gleaming pristine robes, Orisha is the lead vocalist of the Sirens of the Realms, her found family. She is of such great renown, that she needs no last name.

abilities.name: Flaming Wings

raw.tip_text: When Orisha uses her ultimate her Wings burst aflame, increasing damage, kills further increase damage but make the wings burn out more quickly.
raw.name: Flaming Wings

description.pre: Whenever Orisha uses Radiant Soul, her angel wings burst aflame and Flaming Wings gains $(orisha_max_stacks) stacks. Stacks decay by 1 per second. The damage of Scorching Ray is increased by $(orisha_flaming_buff_base_amount)% plus $(orisha_flaming_buff_stack_amount)% (additive) for every stack remaining. At 0 stacks, her wings and damage bonus are removed. Whenever Orisha gets a kill, the stacks reset to $(orisha_max_stacks), but the decay rate is increased by $(decay_amount)% (multiplicative).

conditions.desc: ^^Current Stacks: $(orisha_flaming_stacks)^Current Buff Amount: $(orisha_flaming_buff_amount)%

abilities.desc: When Orisha uses her ultimate her Wings burst aflame, increasing damage, kills further increase damage but make the wings burn out more quickly.

abilities.name: Bardic Connection

raw.tip_text: Orisha has a strong connection with Vlahnya, they strongly buff each others abilities.
raw.name: Bardic Connection

description.pre: Orisha seeks out Vlahnya in the formation and increases the damage of Champions along the shortest path(s) between herself and Vlahnya by $(amount)%.

conditions.desc: ^^{If Vlahnya is not in the formation, this ability applies to only adjacent Champions at a reduced amount.}#afafaf

abilities.desc: Orisha has a strong connection with Vlahnya, they strongly buff each others abilities.

abilities.name: Diva Mode

description.desc: Whenever there is a boss monster on the screen, Orisha's Flaming Wings and Bardic Connection abilities are increased by $(amount)%.

abilities.desc: Whenever there is a boss monster on the screen, Orisha's Flaming Wings and Bardic Connection abilities are increased by 100%.

ult.description: Orisha eyes light aglow and two angel wings burst from her back. A wave of divine energy surges across the screen damaging all enemies.
ult.long_description: Orisha eyes light aglow and two angel wings burst from her back. A wave of divine energy surges across the screen damaging all enemies.

items.description: Come on, we need to fit in here!

items.name: Cloak of Many Fashions
items.description: Looking good is its own revenge.

items.description: Wait, did it happen again?

items.name: Robe of Resilience

items.description: Watch me roll.

items.description: I'd rather go without.

items.description: Gotta look my best for our show!

items.name: Diva Crown

items.description: Let's do this, Sirens!

items.name: Missed Show Flier
items.description: Ghost was a cat at the time..?

items.description: They loved the show, just not the fight that broke out after.

items.name: Yawning Portal Presents
items.description: All proceeds go to Durnan to pay for portal repair.

data.backstory: Alyndra Alexandria Garanahil Sarrbarand is known by many names: Lorekeeper of Rime Spiro, Kinscribe of Clan Monkeymouse, Daughter of Oblivion, Fate Changer, Knight of Wonder and Captivation...and apologetic offspring of Avren & Sofieus.

abilities.name: Portent

raw.tip_text: Every 30 seconds, Alyndra peers into the future of the formation, increasing the damage of random adjacent Champions.
raw.name: Portent

conditions.desc: Every $(portent_time) seconds, Alyndra randomly chooses up to three adjacent Champions and peers into their futures, helping guide their attacks and increasing their damage by $(amount)%.
Every $(portent_time) seconds, Alyndra randomly chooses up to two adjacent Champions and peers into their futures, helping guide their attacks and increasing their damage by $(amount)%.
^^Total Bonus: $(amount)%^Portent refreshes in $(alyndra_portent_time_left) seconds

abilities.desc: Every 30 seconds, Alyndra peers into the future of the formation, increasing the damage of random adjacent Champions.

abilities.name: Brows of Judgement

raw.tip_text: Griff judges enemies as they spawn increasing the effect of Portent per judged enemy.
raw.name: Brows of Judgement

effect_keys.comment: amount is chance to apply to non-boss, otherwise, it's 100

description.desc: Griff, Alyndra's owl companion, sits on Alyndra's shoulder and judges enemies as they spawn. They have a $(amount)% chance to judge normal enemies as unworthy, and a 100% chance to judge bosses as unworthy. For each living unworthy normal enemy, Portent's base buff is increased by $(amount___3)%, stacking additively. Each living boss increases Portent's base buff by $(amount___4)%.

abilities.desc: Griff judges enemies as they spawn increasing the effect of Portent per judged enemy.

abilities.name: Heroes of the Planes

effect_keys.override_key_desc: Increases the effect of Freely's Unlucky For Them ability by $(amount)%
Increases the effect of Penelope's Chwinga Mask: Tools for the Job Charm ability by $(amount)%
Increases the effect of Orkira's Elemental Fire ability by $(amount)%

description.desc: If Portent is applied to a Champion under the effect of certain Heroes of the Planes Champions' abilities, those effects are increased in power.^^Avren: Mirror Image effects on the Portented Champion is increased by $(amount)%^Freely: Unlucky For Them increased by $(amount___2)% for each Portented Champion affected by Luck of Yondalla (stacking multiplicatively)^Penelope: Chwinga Mask: Tools for the Job Charm increased by $(amount___3)% for each Portented Champion affected by Chwinga Mask (stacking multiplicatively)^Briv: Netherese Steel effects on the Portented Champion is increased by $(amount___6)%^Orkira: Elemental Fire increased by $(amount___8)% for each Portented Champion affected by Lesser Restoration (stacking multiplicatively)^Widdle: Vampiric Gaze effects on the Portented Champion is increased by $(amount___7)%

abilities.desc:
If Portent is applied to a Champion under the effect of certain Heroes of the Planes Champions' abilities, those effects are increased in power.  
>   
> Avren: Mirror Image effects on the Portented Champion is increased by 200%  
> Freely: Unlucky For Them increased by 200% for each Portented Champion affected by Luck of Yondalla (stacking multiplicatively)  
> Penelope: Chwinga Mask: Tools for the Job Charm increased by 200% for each Portented Champion affected by Chwinga Mask (stacking multiplicatively)  
> Briv: Netherese Steel effects on the Portented Champion is increased by 200%  
> Orkira: Elemental Fire increased by 200% for each Portented Champion affected by Lesser Restoration (stacking multiplicatively)  
> Widdle: Vampiric Gaze effects on the Portented Champion is increased by 200%.

raw.name: Expansive Vision

specs.desc: Portent now applies to (up to) three random adjacent Champions instead of (up to) two.

items.name: Ancient Longsword
items.description: The blade been passed through many generations.

items.name: Elven Blade
items.description: Do you have a specific story you'd like me to tell?

items.name: Logic
items.description: The runes spell logic in elvish.

items.name: Blade of Infinite Possibilities
items.description: I have forseen this moment.

items.name: Backup Spellbook
items.description: It's really more of a journal of our travels at this stage.

items.name: Spellbook
items.description: Oghma has blessed me with knowledge.

items.name: Reason
items.description: Is it a mace case, or a case mace? It is both.

items.name: A Reasonable Conclusion
items.description: A millenium of knowledge resides within.

items.name: Memory Stone
items.description: I will always remember flying through the forest together on a parliament of giant owls.

items.name: Sardonyx Stone
items.description: I worry this between my fingers whenever I feel lost.

items.name: Home Stone
items.description: A piece of the centerstone from the Chondalwood, the ancestral home of Clan Monkeymouse.

items.name: Stone of Clan Monkeymouse
items.description: So long as you have a piece of home with you, you're always there. I hold this near my heart.

items.name: Rough Necklace
items.description: Griff keeps nipping at the string. It makes it quite scratchy.

items.name: Ouroboros Charm
items.description: Time is a line, except when it's a circle.

items.name: Tokens of Identity
items.description: My family is complicated, but friendship is simple, isn't it?

items.name: Alyndra's Talismans of Time
items.description: This strings together the past and the future.

items.name: Penelope's T-Rex
items.description: The speech bubble says 'Rrrraarrrrr!'

items.name: A Moment in History
items.description: I was a T-Rex, Penelope was a Dire Wolf. It was a typical Tuesday.

items.name: Rough Carving of a T-Rex
items.description: Briv did his best on this one.

items.name: T-Rex Miniature Figurine
items.description: Made of Netherese Steel, it takes up a 3x3 square.

items.name: Ink & Quill
items.description: Someone MUST keep track of these adventures!

items.name: Pen of Oghma
items.description: This unbreakable pen is stronger than any sword.

items.name: Lorekeeper's Tome
items.description: When you have parents like mine, it pays to do more research.

items.name: Symbol of Oghma
items.description: Knowledge is power.

data.backstory: Orkira Illdrex is a gold dragonborn from the Nentir Vale, where she grew up nurturing a love of healing and fire. Between a strange life filled with monsters, Gods, time and multiplanar travel, death, the destruction of worlds and the saving of others, Orkira has survived and adapted to deal with any situation with a motto of 'One problem at a time.'

abilities.name: Lesser Restoration

raw.tip_text: Orkira heals non-adjacent Champions who are damaged.
raw.name: Lesser Restoration

description.desc: Orkira heals all non-adjacent damaged Champions for $(amount) health per second.

abilities.desc: Orkira heals non-adjacent Champions who are damaged.

abilities.name: Elemental Fire

raw.tip_text: Orkira leaves a stacking debuff and DoT on enemies she damages.
raw.name: Elemental Fire

description.desc: Whenever Orkira damages an enemy, they receive one stack of Elemental Fire, taking $(dot_percent)% of Orkira's damage per second for $(debuff_time_limit) seconds and receiving $(amount)% additional damage from all attacks. This ability stacks up to $(debuff_max_stacks) times (additively) and attempting to add another stack will reset the cooldown of all stacks.

abilities.desc: Orkira leaves a stacking debuff and DoT on enemies she damages.

abilities.name: Healing Flame

description.pre: Increase the effect of Elemental Fire by $(not_buffed amount___2)% for each order of magnitude worth of effective healing done with Lesser Restoration on the current run.

conditions.desc: ^^Effective healing done: $(orkira_healing_flame_amount_healed)

abilities.desc: Increase the effect of Elemental Fire by 100% for each order of magnitude worth of effective healing done with Lesser Restoration on the current run.

abilities.name: Self Sacrifice

description.pre: If a Champion Orkira is able to heal (ie. non-adjacent) is about to take a killing blow, Orkira instantly swaps formation slots with that Champion for $(duration) seconds and takes the hit for them. During this time Orkira's overwhelm point is set to twice the other Champion's and neither Orkira or the other Champion can be moved, removed, or swapped out; after the time expires they swap back regardless of whether Orkira and/or the other Champion died during the time. This effect can only occur once every $(cooldown) seconds.

conditions.desc: ^^$(orkira_self_sacrifice_cooldown)

abilities.desc: If a Champion Orkira is able to heal (ie. non-adjacent) is about to take a killing blow, Orkira instantly swaps formation slots with that Champion for 10 seconds and takes the hit for them. During this time Orkira's overwhelm point is set to twice the other Champion's and neither Orkira or the other Champion can be moved, removed, or swapped out; after the time expires they swap back regardless of whether Orkira and/or the other Champion died during the time. This effect can only occur once every 60 seconds.

ult.description: Orkira summons The Phoenix to rain Elemental Fire down upon the battlefield. This deals damage and increases the Elemental Fire stacks.
ult.long_description: Orkira flies up over the enemies, grasping The Domain of the Phoenix and uttering a prayer, summoning The Phoenix to rain Elemental Fire down upon the battlefield. This deals damage and increases the Elemental Fire stacks of affected enemies by 1 every 2 seconds for 10 seconds.
ult.name: Radiance of the Phoenix

base.description: Orkira leaps to a random enemy and attacks with a small AoE cone of fire.
base.long_description: Orkira leaps to a random enemy and attacks with a small AoE cone of fire.
base.name: Burning Hands

items.description: The Phoenix represents creation, destruction, resurrection, and renewal.

items.name: Opulent Holy Symbol
items.description: The Phoenix is wonderful! They're warm, welcoming...and they always listen!

items.name: Well-Worn Pants
items.description: Hi. Did you have any questions? I get this a lot.

items.name: Pants That Fit!
items.description: It's real hard to find clothing that fits, I gotta make what I have last!

items.name: Orkira's Makeshift Pants
items.description: I got custom-tailored clothing in Waterdeep! They even fit around the tail!

items.name: Pantaloons of the Dragonborn
items.description: Yeah. I'm used to being weird everywhere.

items.name: Cooking for Friends
items.description: When you find... people, friends... family, It's easy to feel welcome finally.

items.name: Tasty Burn Paste
items.description: Got some burns? I've got the antidote.

items.name: Marshmallow Paste
items.description: It's REALLY fluffy.

items.name: Homemade Treats
items.description: I made some for everyone!

items.name: Pillow Rocks
items.description: Who me? I can sleep anywhere. Can you pass the scratchy rock?

items.name: Decision Pebbles
items.description: One problem at a time.

items.name: Letters from Alyndra
items.description: We're going to get coffee and truffles soon.

items.name: Harold's Accordion
items.description: I'd do anything to protect him! I feel bad about the accordion though...

items.name: Undead Basher
items.description: Tell Avren I do NOT need one of his creepy bags, this'll work just fine!

items.name: Traveler's Sac
items.description: Do you not have dragonborn in this plane of existence?

items.name: Orkira's Jump Bag
items.description: My whole life is in this bag. I'm always ready to go!

items.name: Resurrection Components
items.description: I need to save a little bit, in case one of you dies...

items.name: Phoenix Drawing
items.description: I hate being cold. Even the reminder of warmth helps!

items.name: Penelope's Feather Art
items.description: Wow! I really like... all the... flames. Can I keep this?

items.name: Ashes of the Phoenix
items.description: It's my job to keep others from getting burned.

items.name: Phoenix Feather
items.description: Doesn't it just... So pretty...

data.backstory: As a member of Rivals of Waterdeep, Shaka is always looking for the latest adventure and the latest puzzle. His party has encountered mysteries and foes throughout Waterdeep, Candlekeep, Icewind Dale, and Avernus. Their base of operations is located in the Trollskull Manor in Waterdeep where a brain in a jar named Brian stands watch.

abilities.name: A Celestial Puzzle

raw.tip_text: Shaka solves a random puzzle on each adventure, buffing all Champions
raw.name: A Celestial Puzzle

conditions.desc: Shaka attempts to solve a celestial puzzle with the potential for great rewards. Five random slots in the formation are assigned a random tag. For each Champion in those slots that match the slot's tag, Shaka buffs the party by $(not_buffed amount___2)%, stacking multiplicatively. The total effect is buffed by $(not_buffed amount___3)% for each other Rivals of Waterdeep Champion in the formation.

Shaka attempts to solve a celestial puzzle with the potential for great rewards. Four random slots in the formation are assigned a random tag. For each Champion in those slots that match the slot's tag, Shaka buffs the party by $(not_buffed amount___2)%, stacking multiplicatively. The total effect is buffed by $(not_buffed amount___3)% for each other Rivals of Waterdeep Champion in the formation.

abilities.desc: Shaka solves a random puzzle on each adventure, buffing all Champions.

abilities.name: Feast or Famine

description.desc: Shaka increases the effect of A Celestial Puzzle by $(not_buffed amount)% for each puzzle slot he's adjacent to. This ability can be buffed by equipment and feats

abilities.desc: Shaka increases the effect of A Celestial Puzzle by 20% for each puzzle slot he's adjacent to. This ability can be buffed by equipment and feats.

specs.name: Better Luck Next Time

raw.name: Better Luck Next Time
raw.specialization_description: Shaka gives up on the current puzzle and tries to solve a new one

description.desc: The slots chosen for A Celestial Puzzle are rerolled.

specs.desc: The slots chosen for A Celestial Puzzle are rerolled.

specs.name: Sunday Edition

raw.name: Sunday Edition
raw.specialization_description: Shaka focuses on the current puzzle increasing the number of affected slots

description.desc: An additional slot in the formation is assigned a random tag and can be matched to further increase A Celestial Puzzle.

specs.desc: An additional slot in the formation is assigned a random tag and can be matched to further increase A Celestial Puzzle.

ult.description: All enemies are pushed back slightly and then a wall of light appears slightly in front of the formation for 15 seconds.
ult.long_description: All enemies are pushed back slightly and then a wall of light appears slightly in front of the formation for 15 seconds. Enemies that pass through the wall of light take damage and gain a brilliant white glow under their feet for 30 seconds. Enemies with this glow have a 75% chance to miss with all attacks.
ult.name: Blinding Wall of Light

base.description: A beam of crackling green shoots towards an enemy, dealing damage.
base.long_description: A beam of crackling green shoots towards an enemy, dealing damage.

animations.comment: for some reason the eldritch blast graphic origin point is in the center, so x here is 95+29=124

base.name: Eldritch Blast

effects: Increases the damage of all Champions by 10% for each Champion in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Male Champions by 125%.
Increases the damage of all Tiefling Champions by 150%.
Increases the damage of all Champions with a CHA score of 13 or higher by 150%.
Increases the damage of all Champions with a CON score of 11 or higher by 100%.
Increases the damage of all Magic Champions by 150%.

data.name: Shaka

items.name: Unlucky Crossbow
items.description: Be careful. I shot myself in the foot with this once. It's a long story.

items.name: Backwater Crossbow
items.description: You don't mess with someone with a crossbow on their back.

items.name: Target Shooter
items.description: Look! No. Over there! Hang on... Watch the bolt.

items.name: Gold-Plated Crossbow
items.description: It might be a bit too extravagant to carry around Waterdeep.

items.name: Old Faithful Blade
items.description: Growing up as a tiefling means knowing when you're in trouble.

items.name: Blade of Avernus
items.description: I lost my patron once. It wasn't great. Neither was he, if I'm being honest.

items.name: Luck Blade
items.description: I think it's broken. Unrelated; does anyone have a bandage?

items.name: Fancy Blade
items.description: I picked it up in Avernus. Not really sure why it's so fancy.

items.name: Scribbled Maze
items.description: Ooooh... This one is a tough one!

items.name: Fishtank Decoration
items.description: It gives Brian the brain something to enjoy when he isn't mind blasting.

items.name: Sculpted Maze
items.description: It'll look great in Trollskull!

items.name: Maze Brooch
items.description: I made it with my parents when I was a kid.

items.name: Traveling Robes
items.description: Whether we're in weird forests or the Nine Hells, you gotta be comfortable.

items.name: Vestments of the Lost Warlock
items.description: Yeah, my last patron would have hated this outfit.

items.name: New Robes
items.description: New Patron: New Shaka!

items.name: Celestial Warlock Robes
items.description: A gift from my Celestial patron, Kagoya.

items.name: Old Locket
items.description: It reminds me of some of our weird adventures.

items.name: Rinn's Gifted Locket
items.description: I keep it close to my heart.

items.name: Mysterious Locket
items.description: Oh, that glow? Don't worry about that. Also, don't touch.

items.name: Locket of the Rivals
items.description: It holds an image of my family.

items.name: Lifelong Cap
items.description: It covers my horns.

items.name: Undercover Hat
items.description: I'm basically invisible, right?

items.name: Cap of the Traveling Tiefling
items.description: Keeps my head cool, and my horns covered!

items.name: Armored Hat of the Puzzler
items.description: Huh? Sorry, I was lost in thought.

data.backstory: Mehen's life changed three times: once when he was exiled from the dragonborn stronghold of Djerad Thymar for refusing to be his tyrannical father's puppet; once when he took in twin tiefling babies abandoned in the snow; and once when his teenaged daughter, Farideh, made a pact with a devil from the Nine Hells. But Mehen is both adaptable and resilient; nothing out there will break his love for his daughters, his sense of self, or the strike of his falchion.

abilities.name: Grumpy

raw.tip_text: Mehen buffs Champions in his column and all columns in front of him based on a number of events
raw.name: Grumpy

effect_keys.override_key_desc: this is increased an additional $amount% (multiplicative) by Gruff

description.pre: Mehen buffs the DPS of champions in his column and all columns in front of him. This buff is highest at 50 stacks, falling off sharply beyond 10 stacks on either side.

conditions.desc: ^He gains stacks every second: +1 if he is in the front, +5 if he is in the back column and a linear increase for each column between.^Stacks are removed based on the actions of Mehen, Farideh, or Havilar: ^ -10% stacks if they attack^ -10% stacks if they take damage (4 seconds shared cooldown)^ - 5% stacks if they get a kill with a base attack ^^Stacks per Second: $(mehen_grumpy_stacks_per_tick)^Current Stacks: $(mehen_grumpy_stacks)^Total Buff: $(amount)%

abilities.desc: Mehen buffs Champions in his column and all columns in front of him based on a number of events.

abilities.name: Gruff

description.desc: Mehen increases the effect of his Grumpy buff on Champions based on how many columns ahead of him they are. It starts at $(amount)% and is doubled for each additional column.

abilities.desc: Mehen increases the effect of his Grumpy buff on Champions based on how many columns ahead of him they are. It starts at 100% and is doubled for each additional column.

abilities.name: Found Family

raw.tip_text: Mehen grants bonus gold for every Tiefling in the formation.
raw.name: Found Family

description.desc: Increases gold find by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Tiefling Champion in the formation

abilities.desc: Mehen grants bonus gold for every Tiefling in the formation.

abilities.name: Brimstone Angels

description.desc: Increase the effect of Grumpy by $(amount)% if Farideh is in the formation, and a further $(amount)% if Havilar is in the formation (stacking multiplicatively).

abilities.desc: Increase the effect of Grumpy by 400% if Farideh is in the formation, and a further 400% if Havilar is in the formation (stacking multiplicatively).

specs.name: Cheer Up Pops

raw.name: Cheer Up Pops
raw.specialization_description: Mehen focuses on fine tuning his attitude

description.desc: Increases the rate at which Grumpy stacks are added by $(amount___2) (flat increase regardless of column) and increases the effect of Grumpy by $(amount)%.

specs.desc: Increases the rate at which Grumpy stacks are added by 1 (flat increase regardless of column) and increases the effect of Grumpy by 400%.

specs.name: We've trained for this

raw.name: We've trained for this
raw.specialization_description: Mehen focuses on his bond with his daughters

description.desc: Increase the effect of Found Family based on how far from the front of the formation Mehen is placed. Effect is increased by $(amount)% for each column, stacking multiplicatively.

specs.desc: Increase the effect of Found Family based on how far from the front of the formation Mehen is placed. Effect is increased by 20% for each column, stacking multiplicatively.

ult.description: Mehen breathes a cone of lightning that damages all enemies on the screen. Potentially optimizing Grumpy.
ult.long_description: Mehen leaps forward and breaths a cone of lightning that damages all enemies on the screen. If he damages more than 5 enemies then his Grumpy stacks are set to 50 and he gains and loses stacks at 10% of the normal rate for 30 seconds.
ult.name: Lightning Breath

base.description: Mehen leaps out and attacks a random enemy, swinging down and then up, scoring a hit each time.
base.long_description: Mehen leaps out and attacks a random enemy, swinging down and then up with a second swing, scoring a hit each time.
base.name: Double Strike

effects: Increases the damage of all Champions by 100%.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 20% for each Female Champion in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 85% for each Dragonborn Champion in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Champions with a CHA score of 11 or higher by 100%.
Increases the damage of all Champions with a STR score of 15 or higher by 200%.
Increases the damage of all Good Champions by 150%.

data.name: Mehen

items.name: Worn and Torn Chapbook
items.description: Havi keeps sneaking these into my haversack.

items.name: The Lonely Dragonborn
items.description: Havi, this is not subtle.

items.name: Mehen's Travel Reading
items.description: That is not mine...but if you lose my place, you're polishing armor til supper.

items.name: The Viper's Fangs
items.description: ...I don't know if I'm glad Havi's friends with this woman or if I should worry.

items.name: Child's Shortsword
items.description: Every child should have a sword. How else will they learn?

items.name: Worn Sword
items.description: Farideh favored this before Lorcan came around. She could have been a fighter.

items.name: Fancy Shortsword
items.description: More reliable than that cambion of hers, not that Fari wants to hear it.

items.name: Unconventional Blade
items.description: I'm just saying: she could use a sword AND eldritch blast.

items.name: Patchwork Scrap
items.description: I keep it under my chestpiece, close to my heart.

items.name: Baby Blanket Keepsake
items.description: It's hard to believe my fierce, clever girls were ever so small.

items.name: Kallan's Poem
items.description: You have to admire the bravery of a man rhyming 'passion' with 'slashing.'

items.name: Message from the Vanquisher
items.description: No one writes Kallan's letters for him--at least not to me. I miss him.

items.name: Sharpened Blade
items.description: You'll never go wrong with this by your side.

items.name: Wicked Weapon
items.description: I'd prefer you back away so I don't have to re-sharpen this once we're done.

items.name: Ceremonial Falchion
items.description: In Tymanther, even ceremonial weapons have an edge.

items.name: Fatherly Falchion
items.description: This is a sweet gift, girls, but Havi, I am not calling it 'Monster Gutter.'

items.name: Spacers
items.description: You can grow your piercing, or get a larger blade to make the cut. Your call.

items.name: Wooden Piercings
items.description: You get used to being clanless, but in the meantime, these help.

items.name: Jade Eye of Blazing Rorn
items.description: The piercings of my clan--bunch of tyrannical snobs.

items.name: Family Clan Piercings
items.description: Verthisathurgiesh is adaptable after all--my girls and I are a package deal.

items.name: Hammered Breastplate
items.description: Hit them before they have a chance to hit you.

items.name: Battle-Worn Armor
items.description: Listen, nothing looks good once it's gone through a behir.

items.name: Bounty Hunter Chestpiece
items.description: Tough and flexible--it does the job.

items.name: Dragonborn Scale Armor
items.description: It itches and the gems have no defensive purpose.

data.backstory: Selise is of the Turami people, who trained to become a Paladin after losing her beloved wife right in front of her. In her travels, she came across the Rivals and joined up, despite her misgivings about the group. In the time she's been with them, she finally found the one she swore vengeance upon; but in doing so she lost her connection to Tyr.

abilities.name: Divine Sense

raw.tip_text: Selise offers different bonus effects and different ways to buff the champions in the columns behind her in her 4 different stances.
raw.name: Divine Sense

effect_keys.override_key_desc: $target takes $amount% less damage from Melee Attacks

conditions.desc: Increases the damage of Champions in the three columns behind her by $(amount)%^Aggressive: Champions affected by Divine Sense have their base attack cooldowns reduced by $(amount___3)s^Wall: Champions in the same column as Selise take $(amount___4)% less damage from melee attacks^Deflect: Champions affected by Divine Sense take $(amount___5)% less damage from ranged and magical attacks^Last Resort: Selise's overwhelm point is increased by $(amount___6) and Selise's Vow of Vengeance ability is increased by $(amount___12)%^Base damage buff has been increased by $(amount___13)% for each other Rivals of Waterdeep Champion in the formation.

Increases the damage of Champions in the two columns behind her by $(amount)%^Aggressive: Champions affected by Divine Sense have their base attack cooldowns reduced by $(amount___3)s^Wall: Champions in the same column as Selise take $(amount___4)% less damage from melee attacks^Deflect: Champions affected by Divine Sense take $(amount___5)% less damage from ranged and magical attacks^Last Resort: Selise's overwhelm point is increased by $(amount___6) and Selise's Vow of Vengeance ability is increased by $(amount___12)%^Base damage buff has been increased by $(amount___13)% for each other Rivals of Waterdeep Champion in the formation.

abilities.name: Shield of Psychomancy

description.pre: While in Aggressive stance, Selise will toss her shield in an arc targeted at the farthest enemy every 4th attack. It deals damage and stuns all enemies hit for 2 seconds, and the effect of Divine Sense is increased by $(amount)% for each enemy hit (stacking additively) until Selise attacks with Shield of Psychomancy again or changes stances.

conditions.desc: ^^$(selise_shield_of_phychomancy_active)

It deals damage and stuns all enemies hit for 2 seconds, and the effect of Divine Sense is increased by 50% for each enemy hit (stacking additively) until Selise attacks with Shield of Psychomancy again or changes stances.

description.pre: When switching from Last Resort to Aggressive stance, Selise channels the divine power of Tyr and attacks a random enemy with her sword, dealing BUD-based AoE damage and BUD-based chaining lightning damage from the enemy struck to five nearby enemies. This effect can only trigger every $(selise_thunderous_smite_cooldown) seconds.

items.name: Chipped Blade
items.description: Works just as well.

items.name: Found Blade
items.description: Any sword in a storm, right?

items.name: Solid Sword
items.description: I use it to defend my home and my family.

items.name: Neverending Stormblade
items.description: Vengeance comes but once.

items.name: Woodworking Gloves
items.description: They double as good dueling gauntlets.

items.name: Training Gauntlets
items.description: Protects against errant blade knicks.

items.name: Battle-Ready Gear
items.description: I heard there's trouble! Where's the trouble?

items.name: Ruby-Encrusted Gauntlets
items.description: I got them for the next time we meet the Blackstaff!

items.name: Metal Ring
items.description: I carry them to help patch my armor during long rests.

items.name: Simple Ring
items.description: A simple circle, yet it means so much to so many.

items.name: Tarnished Ring
items.description: I won't stop until I have vengeance for what I lost.

items.name: Wedding Band
items.description: I'll always hold you close to my heart, my love.

items.name: Whittling Tools
items.description: It's a wonderful hobby.

items.name: Empty Canvas
items.description: I can already see it in my head.

items.name: Tiwaz Rune Carving
items.description: Let's see what it turns into.

items.name: Carving of the Just
items.description: The rune will help me reconnect with Tyr...eventually.

items.name: Training Shield
items.description: Just hold still. Don't flinch!

items.name: Tiwaz Shield
items.description: Tyr protect me. Let's do this.

items.name: Shield of Hope
items.description: For the longest time, I held on to hope that I'd have my vengeance. Now what?

items.name: Psychomancer Shield
items.description: Do you know how long I had to practice to get it to come back?

items.name: Soiled Cloak
items.description: Today was a day. Anyone have prestidigitation prepared?

items.name: Stained Cloak
items.description: I let my inner bear out, oops?

items.name: Bloodhunter Cloak
items.description: Luckily, stains won't show on this one

items.name: Astorio's Elegant Cloak
items.description: Elminster said it looked 'dashing'!

data.backstory: The imposing presence of Sergeant Knox came to Neverwinter when the Mintarn mercenaries were hired to retake the city following the eruption of Mount Hotenow. Soon he became a daily presence and mentor for new Adventurers in the city. Celeste reached out to her old friend following the catastrophic events at Elturel, hoping the veteran mercenary would join the Champions as they face the greatest foe the Sword Coast has ever seen!

abilities.name: Rallying Cry

raw.tip_text: Sergeant Knox buffs the champions behind him, based on the number of positional formation abilities affecting them
raw.name: Rallying Cry

effect_keys.override_key_desc: Increases the damage of $target by $(not_buffed amount)% for every positional formation ability

conditions.desc: Increase the damage of Champions in the columns behind Sgt. Knox by $(not_buffed amount)% for each positional formation ability affecting them, stacking multiplicatively and including this one.
Increase the damage of Champions in the columns behind Sgt. Knox by $(not_buffed amount)% for each positional formation ability affecting them, stacking additively and including this one.
This is buffed by an additional $(buffed_number 100)% post-stack multiplier.

abilities.desc: Sergeant Knox buffs the champions behind him, based on the number of positional formation abilities affecting them.

abilities.name: Blessed By Selûne

raw.tip_text: Sergeant Knox is at his best when paired with Celeste and Makos
raw.name: Blessed By Selûne

abilities.desc: Sergeant Knox is at his best when paired with Celeste and Makos.

data.backstory: Ellywick Tumblestrum has created music of such stirring quality that she was once invited to the Feywild where she played for the Summer Queen and the Queen of Air and Darkness. So moved were the two queens that they gifted the bard with her instrument, Morningmist. Tumblestrum's affinity for the Feywild brought her and her frog companion, Groak, to the Witchlight Carnival, where she spins tales and sings songs about the Plane of Faerie.

abilities.name: The Deck of Many Things

raw.tip_text: Every 100 areas Ellywick pulls a different card from the Deck of Many Things, modyfing the ability on which she is increasing her bonus.
raw.name: The Deck of Many Things

conditions.desc: $(source_hero) draws a random card from the Deck of Many Things, gaining a random effect from below. The effect persists until she draws a new card. She draws a new random card from the Deck of Many Things after completing 100 areas in the formation. This card replaces any card she is already holding. She can draw the same card multiple times during an adventure, but can not draw the same one twice in a row.^^Knight - Grants one Knight stack for every 100 enemies defeated while this card is active. Knight stacks affect $(source_hero)'s Powerful Following ability. A maximum of 25 Knight stacks can be earned each time this card is active. All Knight stacks persist after the card is discarded.^^Moon - Grants one Moon stack for each boss loot sack earned while this card is active. Moon stacks affect $(source_hero)'s Greatest Song In The Multiverse ability. A maximum of 20 Moon stacks can be earned each time this card is active. Only 50% of the total Moon stacks persist after the card is discarded, rounded up.^^The Fates - Disable all existing stacks from the Deck of Many Things while this card is active. When this card is discarded, all existing stacks amounts are increased by 25%, rounded up.^^Flames - Grants one Flames stack when this card is drawn. All monsters move 100% faster and deal 100% more damage while this card is active for each Flames stack you have, stacking additively. All Flames stacks persist after the card is discarded.^^Gem - Gain one Gem stack for every three gems collected while this card is active. Gem stacks affect $(source_hero)'s Fortunate Soul ability. A maximum of 20 Gem stacks can be earned each time this card is active. Only 75% of the total Gem stacks persist after the card is discarded, rounded up.^^
$(source_hero) draws a card with a different effect from the Deck of Many Thing every 100 areas she completes.^^Currently Drawn Card:^

Areas Until Next Draw: $(delta_areas_till_next_draw)^$(delta_objective_name) Until Next Stack: $(delta_objectives_till_next_drawn_card_stack)^Stacks Gained This Draw: $(delta_drawn_card_session_stacks)^^Knight Stacks: $(delta_knight_stacks)^Moon Stacks: $(delta_moon_stacks)^Gem Stacks: $(delta_gem_stacks)^Flames Stacks: $(delta_flames_stacks)

Areas Until Next Draw: $(delta_areas_till_next_draw)^Stacks Gained This Draw: $(delta_drawn_card_session_stacks)^^Knight Stacks: $(delta_knight_stacks)^Moon Stacks: $(delta_moon_stacks)^Gem Stacks: $(delta_gem_stacks)^Flames Stacks: $(delta_flames_stacks)

Knight - Grants one Knight stack for every 100 enemies defeated while this card is active. Knight stacks affect $(source_hero)'s Powerful Following ability. A maximum of 25 Knight stacks can be earned each time this card is active. All Knight stacks persist after the card is discarded.^^

Moon - Grants one Moon stack for each boss loot sack earned while this card is active. Moon stacks affect $(source_hero)'s Greatest Song In The Multiverse ability. A maximum of 20 Moon stacks can be earned each time this card is active. Only 50% of the total Moon stacks persist after the card is discarded, rounded up.^^
The Fates - Disable all existing stacks from the Deck of Many Things while this card is active. When this card is discarded, all existing stacks amounts are increased by 25%, rounded up.^^

Flames - Grants one Flames stack when this card is drawn. All monsters move 100% faster and deal 100% more damage while this card is active for each Flames stack you have, stacking additively. All Flames stacks persist after the card is discarded.^^

Gem - Gain one Gem stack for every three gems collected while this card is active. Gem stacks affect $(source_hero)'s Fortunate Soul ability. A maximum of 20 Gem stacks can be earned each time this card is active. Only 75% of the total Gem stacks persist after the card is discarded, rounded up.^^

data.backstory: The least ethical of the Oxventure crew, Prudence is a grumpy, power-hungry Tiefling Warlock. Cthulhu is Prudence’s chosen warlock patron and stand-in father figure, and she does The Great Old One proud by waking up and choosing violence every single day. When she’s not doing murders, Prudence enjoys a good book. Well, not a good book. An evil book. She has two in particular with her at all times in the monstrous forms of her beloved bitey book babies, Frisky and The Darkness. Prudence delights in anything creepy, gory and/or openly evil but has a soft spot for her fellow Oxventurers, who are the only folks this former hermit has any patience for. Either that or she hasn’t found space in her busy murdering schedule to murder them yet.

data.backstory: Dashing Human Pirate Rogue Corazón de Ballena grew up as posh Percival Milquetoast, heir to the Milquetoast estate, but he left it all behind - partly for adventure on the high seas, partly to spite his terrible, terrible dad.  Corazón is on a long-term quest to save the former crew of his ship, The Joyful Damnation, from a curse that he is at least partially responsible for. In the short term, the Joyful Damnation has become the Oxventurers’ preferred mode of transportation. Corazón likes to avoid getting his hands dirty, preferring to use fast talking, deception and sheer force of personality to get around trouble. If things come down to a fight, he likes to stay stealthy, hiding, or darting in to take on foes one on one like a true swashbuckler.  And if that fails he can always fall back on the old classic, Grease, the world’s best spell. According to him, And only him.

items.description: I don't know the exchange rate, but this seems like a lot.

items.name: Cursed Coins of the Lost Crew
items.description: If Curly Joe and the others could stop trying to kill me for five minutes, maybe I can finally rescue them.

items.name: Judgy Ring
items.description: I was just napping. Stop looking at me.

items.name: Watchful Ring
items.description: It's like my old crew is always watching me.

items.name: Serpent Ring
items.description: I, uh... won this in a game of chance from a snake priest! Yes.

items.name: Regal Rings of the Corsair
items.description: They each tell a story. Plus they look REALLY good.

items.name: Rogue's Cap
items.description: It looks dashing, right? You can be honest.

items.name: Pirate Hat
items.description: Do you have a drink called grog? I hear pirates drink it.

items.name: Captain's Hat
items.description: And THAT is why Grease is the world's best spell. I'll hear no more on this topic.

items.name: Joyful Damnation's Regalia
items.description: Could someone else steer? I'm having trouble seeing past these feathers.

items.name: Solid Boots
items.description: Is this all they had? They're so... basic.

items.name: Travelling Boots
items.description: I had to buy off the rack because the guy who makes the bespoke ones wasn't in that day.

items.name: Armored Knee Boots
items.description: Let's see them try that again! Or let's maybe just avoid them next time.

items.name: Commander's Boots
items.description: While you're shaking that person, could you also rob them for me?

items.name: Stealthy Overcoat
items.description: I immediately hide.

items.name: Milquetoast's Cloak
items.description: About the only good thing Dad ever did was buy this cloak.

items.name: Swashbuckler's Coat
items.description: Not sure about the swash, but it certainly has a lot of buckles.

items.name: Captain's Coat
items.description: The Joyful Damnation is at your service! Unless you're poor. Or a villain, I guess.

data.backstory: Born in the land of Turmish, Reya came to the holy city of Elturel to train as a Hellrider when she was twelve. As a faithful follower of Torm, Reya trained to sacrifice herself for the greater good. That preparation led to her taking Zariel's sword and joining the Champions, after rescuing the city of Elturel from Avernus.

abilities.name: Searing Radiance

description.desc: Reya imbues adjacent Champions with her Searing Radiance, causing their attacks to deal $(amount)% more damage.

abilities.desc: Reya imbues adjacent Champions with her Searing Radiance, causing their attacks to deal 200% more damage.

abilities.name: Fiend Slayer

description.desc: Fiends become Reya's Favored Foe and take $(amount)% more damage from Reya and adjacent champions.

abilities.desc: Fiends become Reya's Favored Foe and take 400% more damage from Reya and adjacent champions.

abilities.name: Echoes of Zariel

raw.tip_text: The gaze of Zariel passes over champions, the more it visits prior to Reya the higher the bonus to her buffs.
raw.name: Echoes of Zariel

description.pre: The gaze of Zariel turns from Reya and sweeps across the formation, looking at a random number of unique champions before returning to Reya. Once it returns to Reya it increases the effect of Searing Radiance by $(amount)% for each Champion it looked at, including Reya, stacking multiplicatively.

conditions.desc: ^^$(reya_echoes_of_zariel_description)

abilities.desc: The gaze of Zariel passes over champions, the more it visits prior to Reya the higher the bonus to her buffs.

abilities.name: Celestial Champion

raw.tip_text: Reya buffs Good and Lawful Champions more than any other.
raw.name: Celestial Champion

description.desc: All Lawful aligned Champions' damage is increased by $(amount)%. All Good aligned Champions' damage is increased by $(amount)%.

abilities.desc: Reya buffs Good and Lawful Champions more than any other.

specs.name: Champions of Good

raw.name: Champions of Good
raw.specialization_description: The gaze of Zariel focuses on Good aligned Champions.

description.desc: Echoes of Zariel is guaranteed to look at all Good aligned Champions in the formation before returning to Reya.

specs.desc: Echoes of Zariel is guaranteed to look at all Good aligned Champions in the formation before returning to Reya.

specs.name: Champions of Law

raw.name: Champions of Law
raw.specialization_description: The gaze of Zariel focuses on Lawful aligned Champions.

description.desc: Echoes of Zariel is guaranteed to look at all Lawful aligned Champions in the formation before returning to Reya.

specs.desc: Echoes of Zariel is guaranteed to look at all Lawful aligned Champions in the formation before returning to Reya.

ult.description: Lulu puts all enemies to sleep for 10 seconds, then, Reya swings her sword in a massive circle.
ult.long_description: Reya launches to the sky, she lands by SLAMMING the Sword of Zariel into the ground with a shockwave summoning Zariel and her friend Lulu. While Reya communes with Zariel, Lulu zips around the board, putting all enemies to sleep for 10 seconds. While the enemies are asleep and Reya remains in her pose, the Champions deal massive damage against them. When the 10 seconds is complete, Reya removes the sword and swings it in a massive circle.
ult.name: Avatar of Zariel

base.description: Reya leaps out and slashes at a random enemy, cleaving nearby enemies as well.
base.long_description: Reya leaps out and slashes at a random enemy with the Sword of Zariel, cleaving nearby enemies as well.
base.name: Sword of Zariel

effects: Increases the damage of all Champions by 100%.
Increases the damage of all Female Champions by 125%.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 30% for each Human Champion in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 40% for each Champion with a STR score of 15 or higher in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Champions with a CON score of 11 or higher by 100%.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 20% for each Champion in the formation with a GOOD alignment.

data.name: Reya

items.name: Child's Badge
items.description: I was 12 when I swore an oath to Elturel, and the Hellriders.

items.name: Broken Badge
items.description: I'm still the same girl, just with a larger purpose.

items.name: Hellrider Badge
items.description: Even without the Companion, Elturel will always be protected.

items.name: Retired Badge of the Hellrider
items.description: There is more than one city. With the Champions, I can defend them all.

items.name: Hellrider Blade
items.description: My constant companion for almost a decade.

items.name: Ichor-Covered Blade
items.description: Fiends eventually realized that getting in my way was a bad idea.

items.name: The Bleeding Citadel's Prize
items.description: Yael blessed us with knowledge when we needed it most.

items.name: The Sword of Zariel
items.description: Zariel trusted me with this ancient blade. I pray I do her justice.

items.name: Mucked-Up Armor
items.description: You'd be surprised how quickly it gets dirty!

items.name: Hellrider Fatigues
items.description: Good for defending against the hordes of Avernus, not so great for rubble removal.

items.name: Zariel's Holy Armor
items.description: When I took the sword... I understood. Finally.

items.name: Armor of the Avatar
items.description: I am Reya Mantlemorn, Avatar of Zariel. You'll probably want to back down.

items.name: Trumpet of my Dreams
items.description: Memories of Lulu help me sleep at night.

items.name: Lulu's Far-Off Trumpet
items.description: Lulu's trumpet sound was my only clue to the Champions' location in Avernus.

items.name: Lulu the Hollyphant
items.description: Lulu is a rare thing; A true friend. She always has my back.

items.name: Lulu the Mammoth
items.description: I try not to call for her while in cramped quarters... We learned that lesson the hard way.

items.name: Lost Doll
items.description: I feel something pulling us to the east. A mountain... on fire?

items.name: Ruined Childhoods
items.description: The Hellriders have taken up the the task of providing stability to the survivors.

items.name: High Hall Stone
items.description: That place held the happiest of memories prior to the fall. Now it reminds me of my trials.

items.name: Broken Hellrider Sign
items.description: I put it on the wall in Trollskull. A reminder of where I've been.

items.name: Feather Sac
items.description: When you collect hundreds of feathers, you can make a really comfy pillow!

items.name: Small Feathers
items.description: A key spell component for Feather Fall.

items.name: Feather of the Past
items.description: It's from Idyllglen. When I returned with it, I knew Zariel had chosen me.

items.name: Zariel's Golden Feather
items.description: A gift. From my friend.

data.backstory: A spontaneous fighter, a creative ranger, and a daring rogue team up with a humorous bard, a deep-thinking wizard, and a logical cleric. Together, they form a sweet partnership! Each NERD has a role, but like all adventuring parties, they're better together!

data.backstory: Xerophon went to sleep as a prisoner in a Netherese floating city, and awoke centuries later to the Champions asking them questions about a glacier. To say it's been a rough day would be an understatement. In an attempt to avoid the icy tomb of Ythryn, Xerophon joins with the Champions and is willing to see where this decision takes them. After all, they've played many roles in their life, but never the hero.

abilities.name: Adaptable

raw.tip_text: Xerophon causes all Champions to deal more damage, this is buffed by the number of Champion ability scores that do NOT match their specialization choices.
raw.name: Adaptable

description.desc: Increase the damage of all Champions by $(not_buffed amount)%. Further increased by $(amount___2)% for each stack of Adaptable Xerophon has. Each champion provides Adaptable stacks based on the number of specializations that they do not qualify for.

abilities.desc: Xerophon causes all Champions to deal more damage, this is buffed by the number of Champion ability scores that do NOT match their specialization choices.

abilities.desc: When the only enemy alive during Perfect Imitation is a boss, increase the damage bonus of Perfect Imitation by 25% per second, stacking multiplicatively. Stacks reset when the ultimate ends.

abilities.name: Repeated Imitation

description.desc: Increase the damage bonus of Perfect Imitation by $(not_buffed amount___2)% each time it is used in an adventure, stacking multiplicatively up to $(max_stacks___2) times. Stacks reset when the adventure is reset.

abilities.desc: Increase the damage bonus of Perfect Imitation by 5% each time it is used in an adventure, stacking multiplicatively up to 500 times. Stacks reset when the adventure is reset.

abilities.desc: Increase the damage bonus of Perfect Imitation by 25% each time the enemy Xerophon is imitating (or an enemy with the same name) is killed during that use of Perfect Imitation, stacking multiplicatively. Stacks reset when the ultimate ends.

items.name: Cutting Edge
items.description: A knife is a versatile tool, for a commoner or an assassin.

items.name: Tool of the Trade
items.description: Once upon a time, this was my trade and my companion.

items.name: Polished Dagger
items.description: This fits my hand well -- but I'll put it to more heroic purposes than the old one.

items.name: Blade of the Ages
items.description: A reminder of a time and place I've left behind. I doubt Ythyrn's dead will mind.

items.name: Tattered Bindings
items.description: My ability to disguise myself is unparalleled... but it wasn't enough to save me.

items.name: Broken Straps
items.description: The wizard trapped me with his magic and these bindings for thousands of years.

items.name: Remains of Imprisonment
items.description: I was freed to a new world--Ythryn beneath a glacier, Netheril long crumbled to dust and legend

items.name: Reminder of Freedom
items.description: My future lays before me -- a new path, a new me. I am no one's tool and no one's captive.

items.name: Flimsy Cloak
items.description: It doesn't even take the edge off.

items.name: Cold Weather Wear
items.description: The cold seeps through this fabric, but it's better than going without.

items.name: Trusty Hook
items.description: The walls are slick, but this is what I trained for so long ago.

items.name: Jawbone Pick
items.description: It bites into Ythryn's ice like its former own once bit into its prey.

items.name: Ancient History
items.description: The pages are mildewed and fragile.

items.name: Tome of the Empire
items.description: Inside are the memories of Netheril's most powerful wizards.

items.name: Nether Oak Wand
items.description: I had to be stealthy to steal this from the Nether Oak while it was dormant.

items.name: Driftglobe
items.description: Netherese ingenuity at its finest -- why is this world not lit with magic everywhere?

items.name: Iron Ball
items.description: The first rule of the game chain lightning is don't let this hit you.

items.name: Galvanic Sphere
items.description: If this hits, it leaves a bruise and you're out. If you can get it charged though...

items.name: Tines of Lightning
items.description: Pass the ball through these tines so that it charges up.

items.name: Storm Orb
items.description: Hit an opponent with a charged ball and they won't just be out of the game!

items.name: Ancient Garb
items.description: I dressed my best while impersonating the wizard.

items.name: Imperial Attire
items.description: It was easy to blend in with Ythryn's mage class while wearing this.

items.name: Cloak of Another Age
items.description: I get the impression my outfit's a little out of date...

items.name: Fresh New Look
items.description: Jarlaxle gifted me this hat to mark my new life's beginning. How does it look?

data.backstory: D'hani's adventures began when she left Chult out of boredom to travel the world. She joined the Rivals as a spy for their enemy but liked them enough to stay! When not out on missions with the rest of the team, she enjoys painting the things and people she's seen on her travels.

abilities.name: Paint Them Red

raw.tip_text: D'hani paints enemies she attacks, this causes them to take extra damage based on the number of paint strokes she can see.
raw.name: Paint Them Red

description.desc: When $(source_hero) attacks she paints the enemy red. An enemy can be painted up to three times. $(source_hero)'s damage is increased by $(amount)% for each stroke of paint on screen, stacking additively.

abilities.desc: D'hani paints enemies she attacks, this causes them to take extra damage based on the number of paint strokes she can see.

abilities.name: Friendly Rivalry

description.desc: $(source_hero)'s damage is increased by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Rival of Waterdeep in the formation, stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.desc: D'hani's damage is increased by 200% for each Rival of Waterdeep in the formation, stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Way of the Brush

raw.tip_text: D'hani remembers all the enemies she has ever painted, this strengthens her attacks against all future enemies.

data.backstory: Harbinger of mayhem and music, Brig Hellclaw causes mischief anywhere he goes.  As a member of The Sirens of the Realms, he's always on the lookout for the next place to perform.  He prefers singing over combat, but when fighting is inevitable, he's all in!  Together with his Almiraj pet Spikey, when Brig's on the loose you never know what to expect!  His trusty wand of wonder could bring a curse or a boon, but it's all in another day's work for Brig!

abilities.name: Hype

raw.name: Hype

description.desc: Brig increases the damage of everyone in the formation by $(not_buffed amount)%. For each Hype stack the buff is increased by $(not_buffed amount___2)%, stacking additively and then applying multiplicatively.

abilities.desc: Brig increases the damage of all Champions in the formation.

abilities.name: Rallying Chord

description.pre: Brig's Hype is increased by 5 while at least one enemy has been defeated within the last 10 seconds. If no enemy has been defeated in the last 20 seconds, Brig gains 1 Hype stack each time a unique Champion attacks, up to a maximum of 10 Hype stacks.

data.backstory: Widdle is a Gnome turned Dhampir who has made it her life goal to destroy Strahd. Navigating this odd mutation will not be easy for her, but she has made a promise to herself to set a good example for Dhampirs everywhere, with the help of Rend and her friends, to show them that this life does not make you a monster. She is incredibly fast, has a big personality, and an even bigger trenchcoat full of tricks!

data.backstory: Yorven Springpaw disappeared from the Feywild as a child after an encounter with a malicious coven of hags. He ended up lost in the Shadowfell, where he embraced his innate primal spirit to survive. The power of this ancient feral beast helped Yorven do more than survive the dangers of the Shadowfell -- he thrived. When Yorven came across the Witchlight Carnival he managed to convince the owners to bring him on board. When the Witchlight Carnival returned to the Feywild years later, Yorven moved on, seeking his childhood home - and the hags who banished him.

abilities.name: Blood Fury Tattoo

raw.tip_text: Each of Yorven's Ferocious Maul attacks makes the enemy take additional damage for 2 seconds
raw.name: Blood Fury Tattoo

conditions.desc: Each time Yorven attacks during Ferocious Maul the enemy gains a stack of Blood Fury. Each stack causes them to take $(not_buffed amount)% more damage from all sources, stacking multiplicatively. The debuff lasts for 2 seconds but the timer refreshes when it is reapplied.

Each time Yorven attacks during Ferocious Maul the enemy gains a stack of Blood Fury. Each stack causes them to take $(not_buffed amount)% more damage from all sources, stacking multiplicatively. The post-stack value is increased by an additional $(upgrade_bonus 6986)%. The debuff lasts for 2 seconds but the timer refreshes when it is reapplied.

items.name: Iron Scissors

items.description: A memento of a more innocent time, before I was stolen from my home.

items.name: Dragon Card
items.description: The Feywild is a tricky place, but it pays to remember who your friends are.

items.name: First Piercings
items.description: Of course, it hurt when I got them. But the pain is a trifle.

items.name: Wooden Hoops
items.description: Decoration may be frivolous, but it reminds me I am still myself.

items.name: Silver Earrings
items.description: These blaze like the moonlight over Prismeer.

items.name: Golden Jewelry
items.description: There is a warmth to this gold that I never knew in the Shadowfell.

items.name: Markings of Power

items.name: Blood Fury Tattoo
items.description: This tattoo is rage made into ink.

items.name: Eldritch Claw Tattoo
items.description: With this, my enemies' magic cannot stop me.

items.description: I will take this magic into my skin, and rise up a stronger champion.

items.name: Ragged Wrappings
items.description: Abandoned in the Shadowfell, I had only the clothes on my back and a few trinkets.

items.name: Shadowy Garb
items.description: With my legs free, I leap easily from the shadows.

items.name: Kilt of Speed
items.description: I can move faster in this.

items.name: Warrior's Kilt
items.description: It's safe to wear in colors now. As powerful as I've become I don't need to hide.

items.name: Lost Tooth

items.name: Tooth Trophy
items.description: Shadow dragons may be weaker than true dragons, but they are swift and wily.

items.name: Scaled Sporran
